Job Title: Nhân viên Sale Admin - mạnh phân tích số liệu
Company: Công ty cổ phần BW JAPAN
Job Description: I - Trách nhiệm - Chịu trách nhiệm tổng hợp phân tích số liệu kinh doanh, hiệu quả bán hàng của các kênh và kiểm soát hiệu quả kinh doanh của Công ty - Chịu trách nhiệm về tính trung thực, chính xác của thông tin cung cấp và trao đổi, báo cáo trong quá trình thực hiện công việc. - Những trách nhiệm về tài sản, công cụ dụng cụ mà công ty trang bị. II - Mô tả công việc 1. Theo dõi, tổng hợp phân tích các số liệu kinh doanh, hiệu quả bán hàng của các kênh - Xây dựng hệ thống tổng hợp và theo dõi kết quả kinh doanh, hiệu quả bán hàng của các kênh. - Phân tích số liệu, lập bảng so sánh và báo cáo định kỳ về các số liệu bán hàng, mức độ hoàn thành so với chỉ tiêu, chi phí bán hàng của từng kênh, theo từng mã hàng, tỷ lệ hàng hoàn ... - Phân tích báo cáo tình hình bán hàng của NPP, Cửa hàng, các khu vực kinh doanh và đề xuất giải pháp kịp thời. - Theo dõi, báo cáo định kỳ chi phí bán hàng của từng kênh. - Phân tích doanh thu, xu hướng tăng trưởng doanh số theo nhóm hàng, đưa ra các cảnh báo, khuyến nghị. Đưa ra các thông tin dự báo về mức độ tiêu thụ sản phẩm của cửa hàng, các kênh phân phối ... 2. Kiểm soát kế hoạch bán hàng và các hoạt động kinh doanh, hỗ trợ bán hàng của Công ty - Phối hợp với các bộ phận Kinh doanh, phòng Kế hoạch, Kế toán và các phòng ban liên quan kiểm soát hoạt động bán hàng. - Kiểm soát kế hoạch bán hàng, đặt hàng của các bộ phận Kinh doanh và điều chỉnh kịp thời. Tham mưu, góp ý về kế hoạch sản xuất thành phẩm của Công ty. - Theo dõi tốc độ bán hàng và thúc giục các kênh bán hàng. Theo dõi tình hình kinh doanh mã hàng mới, mã hàng cũ, thông báo bộ phận Kinh doanh thúc đẩy. Kịp thời đề xuất kế hoạch đẩy hàng, xả hàng. - Tham mưu, phối hợp hợp bộ phận Kinh doanh xây dựng các chính sách bán hàng, chương trình khuyến mại, đồng thời kiểm soát việc thực hiện và tuân thủ của bộ phận Kinh doanh. 3. Tìm hiểu, phân tích thị trường, đối thủ cạnh tranh và đề xuất các biện pháp cải tiến. 4. Báo cáo công việc theo quy định và thực hiện các công việc hỗ trợ, quản lý theo chỉ đạo của Chủ tịch.
Job Requirements: - Nam/Nữ từ 25 - 40 tuổi, tốt nghiệp đại học các chuyên ngành Kinh tế, QTKD, Kế toán, Phân tích số liệu..hoặc các chuyên ngành có liên quan - Có từ 01 năm kinh nghiệm làm Sale admin, Trưởng nhóm sale admin, Data analyst... trở lên tại các công ty hoạt động trong mô hình bán lẻ, bán buôn (FMCG) - Mạnh về Phân tích số liệu, kiểm soát số liệu bán hàng, hiệu quả kinh doanh - Kỹ năng nghề nghiệp: Kỹ năng tổng hợp, phân tích, thống kê, báo cáo, số liệu. Kỹ năng giao tiếp và làm việc nhóm. Kỹ năng thuyết trình, đào tạo, hướng dẫn và huấn luyện - Cẩn thận, chi tiết, quan tâm tới mức độ chính xác, trách nhiệm cao đối với công việc. - Thành thạo tin học văn phòng (công cụ phân tích số liệu).
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: Triumph International Vietnam Co., Ltd.
Job Description: TRIUMPH INTERNATIONAL (Vietnam) is a 100% FDI company leading in men’s and woman’s undergarments industry steped into Vietnam since 1992. We are looking for talents who are looking for career development, like challenge, patience and have passion for development together with our organization development. This is a 3-month contract position with the potential for permanent employment based on performance and business needs. We are also welcome fresh graduates who are eager to learn and grow in a dynamic work environment. Purpose of the job Drive Plant Improvement Activities / Project Management activities General Duties & Responsibilities Manage all data sources related to projects and maintain them up to date / accurately / on time Perform data analysis / visualization (Excel / Power BI) based on Project requirements Follow up all project activities with project owners in all departments based on project timeline Conduct regular project reviews with project teams Conduct Process Analysis based on project requirements Conduct Process audits based on plan, Conduct training / assist with project training execution Continuous learning on new tools / knowledge based on department managers requirement
Job Requirements: Bachelor Degree of Industrial Management/ System Engineering or other related majors Strong in Data analysis, especially Excel (Advanced level) & Power BI Lean 6 sigma knowledge will be a great advantage English communication (directly report to an expat) Good communication and collaboration skill Learning mindset
Industry: Dệt may / Da giày / Thời trang

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Cơ Khí Xây Dựng Thương Mại Đại Dũng
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: This role requires someone who is detail-oriented and comfortable working with ERP/SAP, MS Excel, and Power BI . The position is based in Ho Chi Minh and reports to the FP&A Manager . What You Will Be Doing : Analyze budget vs. actuals, forecast performance, and variance trends to support financial decision-making. Develop financial models and dashboards in Power BI and Excel to track key metrics. Enhance FP&A processes by identifying improvements and implementing analytical tools. Uncover insights from complex datasets to drive business and financial strategy. Bridge data across Finance, Sales, Manufacturing, and Commercial Operations for a holistic view of performance. Develop and track key performance indicators (KPIs) aligned with Finance and Business Strategy initiatives. Support monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reviews, ensuring data accuracy and delivering meaningful insights to stakeholder.
Job Requirements: What We Need from You: 3–7 years of experience with BI & analytics tools (SQL, Power BI, Excel). At least 2 years of experience in FP&A or financial analytics. Strong financial modeling and reporting skills using Excel & Power BI. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills—ability to turn complex data into clear and actionable insights. High attention to detail and accuracy in handling large datasets. Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, to present data-driven insights effectively. Self-starter with the ability to work independently, take initiative, and drive projects in a fast-paced environment.
Industry: Tài chính / Đầu tư

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH ADI's CLIENT
Job Description: Support the Development of Scorecards for Sales Teams & Regional Markets - Assist in developing KPIs and establishing scorecard metrics. - Help design and create sales reports that summarize key data and trends for stakeholders. Assist in Developing Systems & Processes for Sales Data Analysis - Utilize existing tools (e.g., Qlik Sense, Salesforce) to support data analysis, identify gaps, and resolve issues. - Work with relevant teams (e.g., Finance, IT) to address reporting and analysis challenges. - Contribute to ongoing improvements in reporting processes for the sales team. Provide Support for Business Operations & Sales Teams - Assist with customer data analysis, rebate analysis, ROI analysis for new programs, and sales forecasts. - Design ad-hoc reports to support sales initiatives using available data. Support Sales Target Formulation & Review - Oversee the Sales Target Achievement process (SIP) and manage related inquiries. - Develop a tool to access KPIs in different areas of interest. Assist in Ad-Hoc Projects - Review and understand current systems, providing input for improvements that will enable more detailed program-level analysis for sales teams.
Job Requirements: - Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration or related field - 8-10 years of relevant experience in Business Analyst, Commercial Excellence - Strong ability to present data clearly and concisely - Excellent analytical, report-writing, and verbal communication skills - Experience in project management, sale process management, and facilitating meetings - Comfortable working in a highly matrixed, multicultural organization - Strong sense of ownership, detail-oriented, and a team player - Advanced knowledge of Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel, and Google Slides
Industry: Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất

Company: FE CREDIT
Job Description: OBJECTIVES: Supervise creation of specifications and ensure successful delivery through team and other IT peers. Responsibilities Develop and enhance mobile features and services in strong collaboration with internal and external partners; Translate business strategies and requirements into delivering products through a mobile application that delight our customers and position our company for substantial growth; Closely collaborate with software engineering, UX/UI, data and other teams across the company to support their efforts while delivering digital features and mobile applications at scale; Analyze user feedback and data from the existing digital platform and combine these insights with market analysis to drive mobile product strategy; Analyze data to determine which features are most popular among users and which ones need improvement; Monitor mobile app metrics and KPIs; Work closely with developer teams to deliver with quick time-to-market and optimal resource Help QA team to validate the quality of released features; Maintain mobile app related documentation;
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree, any major 2+ year of experience working with mobile engineering teams defining and building products 2+ years of Agile product management experience At least 3 years of experience in building or managing digital products in iOS and Android Well organized, able to multitask, able to prioritize with minimal direction Strong understanding of digital business, digital banking, digital sales; Strong analytical skills, a plus for a candidate has set an up and running analytic platform to do Data-Driven Decision A deep understanding of mobile best practices, and how these can be leveraged to drive customer engagement Proven track record of working with the engineering team to ship products on time Real-life experience with running qualitative interviews would be a plus Intermediate English skills JIRA, Confluence, Postman, knowledge about mobile app architechture Data analysis skillset would be a plus
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư , CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Phu Hung Securities Corporation
Job Description: Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify opportunities for new products and features. Work with project managers, web developers, and data teams to translate business needs into clear requirements. Develop business cases and user stories to support product development. Analyze the performance of existing products and recommend improvements. Collaborate with internal teams to align product strategies with business goals.
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in finance, business, economics, or related field. 1+ year of experience as a business analyst or other related roles. Proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g. Excel, SQL, Python) and familiarity with visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau, Metabase). Strong analytical skills and experience in market research. Excellent communication and teamwork skills. English communication skills.
Industry: Chứng khoán

Job Title: QA/ QC Manager (Textile/ Apparel/ Garment/ Fashion)
Company: CÔNG TY TNHH THỜI TRANG VÀ MỸ PHẨM ÂU CHÂU
Job Description: The Quality Assurance/ Quality Control Manager, or QA/QC manager, oversees quality standards to ensure the company delivers the highest quality goods or services. Their duties include data analysis, managing product testing, and monitoring all quality factors. Responsibility for ensuring that the company’s products meet quality standards and regulations. Creating and enforcing the quality standards, procedures, and policies for the company. Working with the QA team on testing and quality standards, but they also work with employees in general to ensure they understand the quality standards that are required throughout the process. Quality Assurance Managers stay on top of the latest laws and regulations that impact products. Handling data related to quality to analyze the company’s performance as well as quality reports and documentation that are required as part of the QA procedures. Establishing and implementing the quality standards for products or services Monitoring quality testing and identifying gaps in the testing Staying current on laws and regulations to ensure compliance Overseeing the quality assurance team Training other employees on quality procedures Handling quality reports and documentation Collecting and analyzing quality assurance data Working with suppliers to ensure the quality of supplies
Job Requirements: Minimum 4 years experience in the same role. (Fashion Retail Industry is highly preferred.) Strong attention to detail and organizational skills Critical thinking skills Interpersonal and communication skills Strong ability with numbers and data analysis skills Technical skills and comfort with databases and report-generation software Understanding of quality assurance processes and standards Leadership and teaching skills
Industry: Dệt may / Da giày / Thời trang , Quản lý chất lượng (QA/QC)

Job Title: Nhân viên giám sát kinh doanh
Company: DRIPCARE GLOBAL
Job Description: 1. Kiểm soát công việc của phòng Tư vấn Online : Kịch bản trao đổi với khách hàng, dữ liệu khách hàng, các quy định về data trên các phần mềm nghiệp vụ. 2. Thực hiện giám sát các nội dung trên fanpage trước và trong khi chạy quảng cáo, đảm bảo đầy đủ nội dung, thông tin của thương hiệu tới khách hàng. 3. Theo dõi tương tác hàng ngày của phòng Tư vấn online gửi cho các bộ phận liên quan. 4. Theo dõi chi phí các hoạt động quảng cáo của Khối Marketing; Tập hợp các chứng từ theo quy định thanh quyết toán của công ty. 5. Check các báo giá, đề xuất thanh toán của các bộ phận trong khối MKT với hạn mức được giao; Thống kê và báo cáo các chỉ số về data(địa lý, tỷ lệ phân bổ...) định kỳ tuần/tháng hoặc khi có yêu cầu. 6. Industry: Y tế / Chăm sóc sức khỏe / Thẩm mỹ / Làm đẹp , Bảo hiểm

Company: KKV Vietnam
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Đồng phục', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: 1. Sales Management: • Based on the monthly target issued by the headquarters, manage the store sales and profit indicator; • Track the performance and regularly do data analysis and improvement; • Control cost and maintain sensitive analysis of competing products. 2. Store Management: • Pay attention to the shopping environment and store safety before and after the store, and effectively manage the safety of store assets. 3. Product Management: • Responsible for inventory management such as daily inventory and product expiration date checking; • Develop a loss prevention plan to reduce store losses; • Analyze store product data to plan improvements and increase sales. 4. Display Management: • Inspect and manage the display of goods according to the display standard, supervise the implementation of store display work, and feedback on problems. 5. Training Management: • Responsible for the training and ensuring service management of store personnel, managing customer service feedback, and flexibly handling customer complaints to maintain brand image. 6. Financial Management: • Follow up and deal with the payment and tax work in the store; • Supervise the security of the payment and self-inspection of the store; • Formulate anti-theft measures to supervise the implementation of the store. 7. Personnel Management: • Responsible for the selection, use, teaching, and retention of store employees; • Ensure the staffing of the store, and the construction of the store personnel echelon in, timely training the company's standards and systems to the store staff; • Supervise the implementation of the work, timely summary, feedback, and optimization suggestions. 8. Cultural Management: • Deeply understand the company's information policy; • Promote and implement the company's corporate culture; • Build a good store culture to achieve simplicity and efficiency. 9. Recruitment and Training of new retail staff
Job Requirements: • Bachelor’s degree is preferred; • At least 3 years of experience in store management in the retail industry, especially newly set up retail stores (from 700m2). Preferable candidate from large scale (from 15 staffs) and fast retail company; • Strong data analysis ability, able to grasp the data contacted in the process of store management, including turnover-related data, attrition rate, turnover rate, promotion ratio, etc; • Strong overall planning ability, data statistics, induction, analysis and application ability, workflow and standard formulation ability, commodity analysis and adjustment ability, visual display ability, and keen risk management awareness; • Follow company regional deployment and identify with the company's corporate culture and values. Willing to relocate or travel outstation to other stores; • Able to work on rotating retail operation hours including weekends and public holidays; • Proficient in English (4 skills), and Chinese is a priority (directly report to Chinese Manager); • Expected onboarding date: the middle of February BENEFITS: • Attractive salary. • 100% Full salary in probation period. • SHUI on full salary. • 12 days Annual leave. • Bonus target and Promotion review depends on company policy. • Uniform provided. • Staff discount. • Working with a young, agile team. • Unlimited learning & development opportunity.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ

Job Title: Senior Customer Experience Specialist - NPS Projects
Company: Công Ty CP Vàng Bạc Đá Quý Phú Nhuận - PNJ
Job Description: Position Overview The Senior Customer Experience Specialist will lead the design, implementation, and analysis of the Net Promoter Score (NPS) framework to measure and enhance customer experience. This role focuses on customer journey mapping, developing measurement methods, analyzing CX trends, and driving actionable insights to improve performance and strategic outcomes. Key Responsibilities 1. NPS Project Management Identify, evaluate, and collaborate with partners to develop and implement NPS solutions. Design and deploy effective methods for measuring customer experience at critical touchpoints. Monitor and maintain NPS systems, ensuring reliable and actionable data collection. 2. Customer Journey Mapping Analyze and map customer journeys to identify key touchpoints, pain points, and areas for improvement. Develop detailed journey insights to optimize customer engagement and satisfaction. 3. Market Analysis and Trend Application Research and analyze customer experience best practices and trends in the Southeast Asia region. Benchmark against competitors and integrate global CX trends into strategic planning. 4. Performance Measurement and Monitoring Track and analyze key NPS metrics to identify issues and trends that impact customer experience. Use insights to pinpoint improvement opportunities and optimize performance. 5. Actionable CX Recommendations Translate NPS data into actionable insights and provide recommendations to the CX Project Team. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement solutions that enhance customer experience and drive business growth.
Job Requirements: Key Qualifications Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Customer Experience, or a related field. Experience: 3-5 years of experience in customer experience, project management, or data analysis. Hands-on experience with NPS frameworks or similar measurement methodologies is preferred. Skills: Strong project management and organizational skills. Analytical mindset with expertise in data interpretation and report generation. Excellent communication and presentation skills for cross-functional collaboration. Proficiency in CX tools and data visualization platforms (e.g., Power BI, Excel). Key Competencies Analytical skills to derive actionable insights from NPS data. Strategic thinking to align NPS outcomes with business objectives. Collaborative mindset to work with internal teams and external partners. Proactive problem-solving with a focus on continuous improvement. Reporting Structure Reports to: Customer Experience Manager or CX Department Head. Works closely with: CX Project Teams, Marketing, and Operations. Benefits Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses. Opportunities for professional development in CX strategy and project management. Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Dịch vụ khách hàng

Company: Wanek Furniture
Job Description: This position will play a critical role in bridging the gap between Human Resources (HR) and business units. This role involves leveraging data and insights to support strategic decision-making related to the workforce. By partnering with the Center of Excellence (COE), HR Business Partners (HRBP), and business leaders, the individual will help develop and implement HR programs, analyze data trends, and recommend evidence-based solutions to HR challenges. Roles & Responsibilities: 1. Data Analysis & Reporting: Lead the collection, analysis, and interpretation of HR data from various sources (HRIS, software systems, surveys, etc.). Develop and monitor advanced HR dashboards and metrics, focusing on talent acquisition, employee relations, learning, and development. Identify trends and patterns in HR data to inform strategic workforce planning and decision-making. Provide actionable insights to business leaders by creating detailed reports and presentations that simplify complex HR data for both technical and non-technical audiences. Monitor the health of human resource management through comprehensive data analysis and generate reports with actionable insights. 2. Project Management & Process Improvement: Manage and coordinate HR-related projects, ensuring timely, budget-compliant completion and alignment with project goals. Identify opportunities to streamline and improve HR processes for enhanced efficiency and effectiveness. Lead the development and implementation of new or revised HR processes based on data-driven insights and industry best practices. Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to gather feedback and ensure successful project delivery. 3. HR Program Support: Partner with HR experts in areas such as talent acquisition, compensation and benefits, and employee relations to provide data-driven insights and support program development. Collaborate with COE on various initiatives (talent acquisition, compensation & benefits, employee relations) to provide data-backed insights and support program development. Conduct comprehensive cost-benefit analyses of proposed HR initiatives to assess their impact on the organization. Develop and maintain clear documentation of HR processes and procedures. Stay current with HR trends and best practices to provide evidence-based solutions for challenges and recommend opportunities for continuous improvement. 4. Business Unit Collaboration: Work closely with business leaders to understand their strategic goals and talent needs. Align HR policies and practices with the business objectives of specific departments. Lead cross-functional teams in the development and implementation of HR initiatives aimed at achieving business results. Translate business objectives into actionable HR plans and programs. Perform other tasks as assigned by the department head.
Job Requirements: 1. Education: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. 2. Experience: Minimum 4-5 years of experience in an HR generalist or HR analytics role, preferably within manufacturing operations. At least 1-2 years of management role. 3. Knowledge: Strong experience with HR Information Systems (HRIS). Strong understanding of HR principles, practices, and employment law/regulations. Deep acknowledgement of compensation and benefits systems. 4. Skills and Abilities: Proficient in data analysis tools (Excel, VBA, Power BI, Python, etc.). Excellent communication and presentation skills, capable of simplifying complex data into clear insights for diverse audiences. Strong experience with project management methodologies and a proven track record of delivering successful projects. Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Exceptional problem-solving skills with strong attention to detail. Good English communication . 5. Job Description: I. Compensation Management Compensation System Construction : Lead the implementation and continuous optimization of the compensation and benefits system. Regularly conduct comprehensive market research and competitiveness analysis to ensure that the compensation system has internal fairness and external competitiveness, attracting and retaining core talents. Compensation Issuance and Execution : Coordinate the salary calculation and payment across multiple business segments of the group to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of salary disbursement. Be responsible for the preparation of the annual labor cost budget and carry out dynamic management and control, keeping the annual labor cost within ±[X]% of the budget. Benefits Compliance Management : Rigorously review the operation of social security, provident fund, and the distribution of various welfare subsidies to ensure full compliance with national and local relevant policies and regulations. Guarantee data accuracy to avoid potential risks. Meanwhile, closely collaborate with the finance department to regularly verify labor cost data and ensure the consistency of financial data. II. Performance Management Full - cycle Performance Closed - loop : Establish a scientific and effective performance management system. Develop personalized assessment plans based on the company's strategic goals and promote organizational performance transformation. Continuously monitor the application of assessment results to ensure that performance appraisal is closely integrated with employee incentives, promotions, training, etc., achieving a [X]% improvement in the company's overall performance through performance transformation. Performance Dispute Resolution : Take the lead in performance interviews and dispute mediation, deeply understand employees' demands, and output reasonable suggestions for job transfer and salary adjustment. Actively promote the implementation of performance incentive policies to stimulate employees' enthusiasm and creativity. At the same time, maintain close communication with business departments and adjust performance indicators in a timely manner according to business changes. III. System Operation and Maintenance Digital Tool Empowerment : Be responsible for the stable operation of the attendance and performance systems, and promptly handle data anomalies. Actively promote the online process of human resources management to improve work efficiency and data accuracy and reduce manual operation errors.
Job Requirements: Hard Requirements Educational Background : A bachelor's degree or above in human resources, economics, or related fields. Experience Requirements : More than 3 years of overall management experience in compensation and performance, with rich experience in designing multi - format compensation systems. Language Proficiency : English is the working language. Proficiency in written and spoken English is required for daily communication Core Competencies Professional Proficiency : Proficient in compensation research methodologies and data analysis tools (such as calculating compensation percentile values), and capable of independently completing complex compensation data analysis. Master labor laws, social security policies, and performance appraisal tools (OKR, KPI, BSC, etc.). Compliance and Risk Control : Possess a keen sense of compensation audit, be able to anticipate and effectively avoid labor dispute risks, and ensure the legal and compliant operation of the company. Data - driven : Good at cost - reduction and efficiency - improvement through labor cost modeling, and optimize compensation and performance strategies using data analysis. Soft Skills : Have excellent communication skills to effectively communicate compensation and performance - related matters with employees at all levels; strong team management skills to lead the team to complete various tasks; outstanding project management skills to ensure the smooth progress of projects such as performance transformation. Benefits Competitive salary and benefits, negotiated based on skills and experience. Social insurance contributions are based on the full gross salary. Full compliance with Vietnam Labor Law, including contributions to social, health, and unemployment insurance. Annual leave and public holiday entitlements according to the regulations of the Vietnamese government. A dynamic, professional, and friendly work environment with ample opportunities for growth and advancement. Working Hours: Monday to Saturday Monday to Friday: from 08:30 to 17:30. Saturday: from 09:00 to 17:00.

Conduct market research to inform product development and positioning, focusing on style and price-point benchmarking. 2. Product Development Supervise the product team to meet development timelines. Oversee the product development cycle, from concept to market launch. Facilitate sample reviews and manage sample improvement processes. Supervise material and finishing development to align with collection needs. Work closely with design and production teams to ensure product feasibility. 3. Process Management Manage timelines, resources, and budgets for product development projects. Input and maintain product data in Odoo, including codes, images, line drawings, and packaging details. 4. Cross-Functional Collaboration Collaborate with marketing teams on go-to-market strategies and assigned tasks for tradeshows. Work with QC/QA teams to establish collection standards and conduct random quality audits on production floors. Lead customized orders, guiding them from design to concept approval before handing them over to Sales and R&D.
Job Requirements: Time-to-Market for New Products: Measure the efficiency of the development process. Product Development Budget Adherence: Ensure all projects stay within the allocated budget. Market Fit and Demand Fulfillment Rate: Evaluate how well products align with market needs. Number of Products Developed: Track the volume of successful product launches. Database Accuracy on Odoo: Maintain precise and complete data for smooth cross-department workflows. Stakeholder Satisfaction: Assess feedback on the quality and relevance of new products.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Nội ngoại thất

Company: Công Ty TNHH Hoa Viên Bình An
Job Description: - Tìm kiếm, tiếp cận và tư vấn cho khách hàng tiềm năng dựa trên mạng lưới truyền thông rộng khắp của công ty. - Phát triển data khách hàng, tạo mối quan hệ với khách hàng để tạo ra doanh số: Thiết lập, xây dựng mối quan hệ với Cộng tác viên (cá nhân, tổ chức…) để mở rộng data khách hàng. - Chủ động đưa ra các sáng kiến về các kênh tiếp cận nguồn khách hàng mới. - Thực hiện các công việc, nhiệm vụ khác do cấp trên giao phó.
Job Requirements: Kinh nghiệm: Ưu tiên đã có ít nhất 02 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực bất động sản, mỹ phẩm/thời trang cao cấp, chăm sóc sắc đẹp, hàng tiêu dùng cao cấp... Nam/Nữ tuổi từ 25-45 tuổi; trung thực, nhanh nhẹn. Ưu tiên: Ngoại hình ưa nhìn là 1 lợi thế. Yêu cầu thành thạo vi tính văn phòng. Hoa hồng: tối thiểu 40 triệu/tháng. Được đào tạo bài bản bởi các chuyên gia hàng đầu trong lĩnh vực Công viên nghĩa Trang. Được tạo điều kiện tiếp cận data KH từ các sự kiện, các kênh truyền thông do Chủ Đầu tư thực hiện. Được hưởng các chế độ phụ cấp, đãi ngộ, thưởng: Lễ, Tết, Hiếu, Hỷ... Di chuyển bằng ô tô khi đưa khách đi tham quan dự án. Được làm việc trong một môi trường chuyên nghiệp, có cơ hội thăng tiến cao. Được hưởng các chế độ: lương tháng 13, BHXH, BHYT, BHTN,... Số lượng: 20 nhân sự.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Bất động sản

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Công Nghệ Sen Đỏ
Job Description: - Oversee and optimize online sales performance on the Sendo Farm app, ensuring a seamless and engaging shopping experience. - Collaborate with the purchasing team to curate an attractive product assortment, maintain competitive pricing, and develop effective promotional campaigns. - Develop and execute data-driven sales strategies based on customer shopping behavior and market trends. - Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) such as conversion rates, order volume, and customer engagement to identify growth opportunities. - Work closely with Marketing, Operations, and Tech Teams to enhance the in-app user experience and maximize customer reach. - Utilize sales data insights to optimize product offerings, pricing strategies, and promotional initiatives
Job Requirements: - Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, E-commerce, Economics, or a related field. - 5 years of experience in retail or e-commerce, preferably within supermarket chains, convenience stores, or online grocery platforms with app-based ordering systems. - Strong expertise in e-commerce operations, product assortment management, and online sales growth strategies. - Highly analytical, with a data-driven mindset and the ability to derive actionable insights from sales performance metrics. - Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to work cross-functionally across multiple departments. - Experience in the retail industry is highly preferred. Competitive salary & benefits - 13th - month salary and performance bonus (based on KPI) - Salary Review and promotion - Insurance For Yourself - Annual Health Check - 20 days of annual leave - Company trips and team buildings - Gathering Activities on special occasions - Other

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần GreenFeed Việt Nam
Job Description: Business Analyst (BA) assists in the identification and analysis of business requirements and systems specifications. He/she conducts feasibility studies and analysis on the risk and benefits of proposed solutions. The BA analyses systems and processes to identify enhancement opportunities to resolve system gaps, evaluates the ability of an existing system to support proposed changes, and identifies systems deficiencies and performance gaps. The BA is knowledgeable of techniques to elicit and manage requirements, as well as software development models including Agile methodologies. He/she is also familiar with requirements life cycle management, analysis planning and monitoring, requirements analysis and design definition. He/she possesses an analytical mind, able to see interlinkages with system solutions and usability, adopts a systematic approach in handling ambiguous or complex issues, and actively discusses his perspectives to arrive at effective solutions. Key tasks: Assist in identifying and in-depth analysis business needs and system requirements, translating business requirements into functional specifications. Conduct feasibility studies on proposed solutions, provide analysis to support the development of business cases Conduct analysis on the risk and benefits for the proposed solutions Creating comprehensive, well-thought-out lists of requirements to present to the executives in the corporation Analyze systems and processes to identify enhancement opportunities to resolve system gaps Evaluate the ability of an existing system to support proposed changes and identify systems deficiencies and performance gaps Ensure proposed solutions and/or enhancements are aligned with user needs and requirements Preparing detailed functional specifications for required development activities Act as the liaison between users and technical staff throughout the solution implementation cycle Develop test plans and test cases, document post-test evidence of expected results or defects. Coordinate training for new users, UAT, integration testing in accordance with the implementation plan Creating data-driven reports in order to reflect the current state of the business’s operations accurately Effectively communicate your insights and plans to cross-functional team members and management
Job Requirements: A bachelor’s degree in business, computer science or a related field will be required, while an MBA will also suffice A minimum of 5 years’ experience in business analysis or a similar field The ability to collaborate closely with stakeholders in order to determine solutions that will benefit the business BI tool, Data visualization and presentation skills Strong communication skills Project management experience
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Công ty CP Giáo dục Quốc tế Việt Úc
Job Description: Implement the Purchasing activities (historical data analysis, refine requests, coordinate with requester to build up the required product/service, process price negotiation, Contracts, Delivery/installation/after-sales service), … ensuring that maximum value for money benefits are achieved through supplier rationalization and procurement process Implement and periodical review Budgeting activities of Procurement department and other functions, the campus (historical data analysis, refine spending requirement, coordinate with requesters to build up the budget, control price/cost, budget movement), … to ensure all financial KPI of the whole organization regarding to procurement activities. Follow framework for the Contract, Purchasing/Budgeting Procedures and Payment Procedure Build and develop good relationships with key suppliers to ensure best value for money and customer satisfaction with services provided Deliver effective purchasing in cost/time/quality improvement in conjunction with the Head of other functions to ensure that value for money and economies of scale are used to Company’s benefit, where appropriate budget Liaise with other department to establish and maintain effective and relevant procurement/budgeting activities and support in relation to the organization’s main activities, purchasing, inventory management, consumption, after sales services and overall operating functions. Work effectively with other staff across the organization to ensure policies and procedures are followed, Continually develop procurement expertise across the team to support staff development, knowledge and expertise in procurement activities. Procurement Buyer will execute the procurement activities in Vietnam International School that span sourcing, vendor negotiation, delivery saving value, stock and delivery management, contract management, with frequent monitor budget requirement and end user’s satisfaction.
Job Requirements: University degree preferably in related subject or substantial relevant experience 2-5+ years of broad procurement experience, specifically 1-2 years for strategic sourcing, supplier base improvement, contract management, Experience in both Multi-national company and middle – size starts up company. Particular in-service related company. Familiar with international school industry preferred Good data analysis skills Experience of purchasing, contract management. Commercial and contractual knowledges. Negotiating and influencing skills Detail-oriented with data analysis skills, especially in budgeting, cost controlling… Skillful in Excel, ERP system High sense of responsibility, Professional & pleasant, Open to changes and willing to learn new things, Highly cooperative and respectful for other team members Benefits: Attractive salary package Obligated insurances (HI, SI, UI), 24/24 Accident Insurance, Personal Tax (if any) are covered by VAS 50% discount of tuition for 2 children Free lunch at school and uniform Team building, yearly staff-outing Opportunity of internal training or coaching

Company: Công ty CP Giáo dục Quốc tế Việt Úc
Job Description: General description: VAS was founded in 2004 and has grown rapidly. It is one of a few schools in Vietnam offering to Vietnamese nationals the K - 12 Vietnamese Curriculum to a high standard whilst at the same time teaching the Cambridge International Curriculum. About this job We are looking for a CRM Intern to support critical operational needs during the implementation of NetSuite. This role will temporarily support the Admissions Analysis Manager and CRM team leaders with basic tasks, ensuring Salesforce stability while allowing resources to focus on the NetSuite project. Scope of the role/ Key Responsibilities The tasks include but are not limited to: 1. NetSuite implementation Support • Assist Admissions Analysis Manager in executing daily tasks required for NetSuite implementation. • Support the preparation and execution of test plans and test cases, ensuring thorough coverage. 2. Training, Testing and Documentation • Support the training team in organizing and conducting training sessions for end-users. • Support the development and refinement of training materials and user guides. • Track and document issues and resolutions systematically for future reference. • Participate in system testing to identify and document any issues or bugs that may impact users. 3. Salesforce Post-Go-Live Support • Provide daily support to the project team by assisting CRM team leaders with Salesforce-related tasks during the post-go-live phase. • Provide first-level support to end-users, resolving queries and providing guidance on Salesforce best practices. • Share user feedback on system performance and user experience with the vendor and development team for continuous improvement. 4. Collaboration and Coordination • Collaborate with Salesforce vendors, administrators, and project team members to enhance system functionality. • Collaborate with campus teams to provide end-user support, ensuring the effectiveness and efficiency of the software usage. 5. Additional Responsibilities • Assist with managing Netsuite and other projects (e.g., Salesforce enhancements, call center operations) to ensure no disruptions to core operations during NetSuite implementation. • Cooperate with campuses to collect data as well as ensure data accuracy for reporting analysis. • Other tasks as assigned by CRM team leaders and Admissions Analysis Manager. Internal contacts • Central Admissions team • Campus Admissions team • Other Departments at Head Office External contacts • Software vendor
Job Requirements: • Graduated Student with BA/College degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Business, or related fields. • Proficient in software, excel, have basic English level • Basic understanding of Salesforce and NetSuite platforms is a plus • Experience assisting in system implementations, data backfills, or user support is highly desirable • Strong organizational and time management skills • Strong skills of excel and application software • Ability to work under pressure with tight deadline • Responsible, innovative, result-orientation, careful, flexible and teamwork
Job Type: Nhân viên chính thức, Thực tập
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , Mới tốt nghiệp / Thực tập

Job Title: LẬP TRÌNH WEB -FULLSTACK DEVELOPER (C#.NET CORE, REACTJS, NEXTJS)
Company: Công Ty CP Du lịch và Tiếp Thị GTVT Việt Nam- Vietravel
Job Description: Phát triển các hệ thống web ứng dụng cho công ty du lịch theo mô hình Microservices . Xây dựng và tối ưu hệ thống Backend bằng C#.NET Core và Frontend bằng ReactJS, NextJS . Thiết kế, phát triển API (RESTful, GraphQL) để kết nối với các hệ thống khác (OTA, Booking, CRM, Chatbot…). Quản lý, tối ưu cơ sở dữ liệu ( SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis ). Ứng dụng AI trong lập trình để tối ưu hiệu suất, kiểm thử và cải thiện sản phẩm. DevOps : Triển khai, quản lý hệ thống trên AWS/Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD . Tích hợp và làm việc với hệ thống Data Warehouse (ETL, BI tools). Phối hợp với đội UI/UX để tối ưu trải nghiệm người dùng. Tham gia vào quá trình bảo trì, phát triển các tính năng mới cho hệ thống.
Job Requirements: Kỹ năng bắt buộc: Backend : Thành thạo C#.NET Core , thiết kế API RESTful . Frontend : Thành thạo ReactJS, NextJS , hiểu về SSR, CSR, TailwindCSS hoặc MUI. Database : Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis . DevOps : Biết cách triển khai trên AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD . Version Control : Sử dụng tốt Git, GitHub/GitLab . Unit Test : Có kinh nghiệm viết test bằng xUnit, Jest hoặc tương tự. Kỹ năng ưu tiên (lợi thế nếu có): AI trong coding : Biết cách ứng dụng AI tools (Copilot, ChatGPT, AutoML…) để tối ưu quá trình phát triển. Data Warehouse : Hiểu về kiến trúc ETL, Data Lake, BI Tools (Power BI, Tableau, Google Data Studio) . Microservices Architecture : Hiểu cách xây dựng hệ thống phân tán. Security : Nắm vững các phương pháp bảo mật API, JWT, OAuth2. Hiệu suất cao : Kinh nghiệm tối ưu hiệu suất database, caching, load balancing . Ưu tiên các ứng viên có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực du lịch OTA .
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , Du lịch

Job Description: 1. Product management, merchandizing, pricing and contracting • Assist in managing and coordinating product merchandizing, pricing, and contracting initiatives across retail and corporate sales in collaboration with Commercial leadership of the Business Units. • Support product research tasks and analyze market data to maintain relevance of product offerings. • Collaborate with the Business Strategy teams to ensure CRM configurations are compliant with business specifications. • Ensure that all key organizational documentation related to products, pricing, promotions parameters, and contracting is up to date and communicated efficiently to all relevant stakeholders. • Participate in coordinating activities necessary for successful product launches and ongoing merchandizing efforts, including internal coordination and training. • Propose and implement procedures that display indicators when the quality of service provided is below the expected level specified by BUs or violates the product nature principles specified by the franchisers 2. Job Description: Perform a variety of accounting activities in compliance with accounting principles and standards to control the organization’s financial resources and with all relevant regulations, laws, and reporting requirements. Mainly: • Update regulations: - Updating new regulations/treatments from the accounting/ tax office/ Headquarters and other competent offices for accounting team/related departments. - Issue/update/revise accounting regulations as instructed by accounting manager. • Account Receivable: - Checking AR and AR overdue and coordinating with the departments for on-time collection. - Preparing AR reports (by term, by businesses,…) - Contact the departments for any matters related to AR. • Reports: - To learn new requirements and do the required reports. - To create and follow any management reports as required by GD and Accounting manager. - To support accounting manager in financial analysis and control. + Analyze data and processes to identify trends, anomalies, and areas of improvement, focusing on inventory management and expenses…. + Monitor costs through root cause analysis, addressing variances and potential cost leakage. + Develop and maintain a reporting suite to track key cost. + Conduct monthly reports, plans, and forecasts of stock levels and cost, providing variance analysis and insights. • Other responsibilities - Any others as required by the managers.

Company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN GREEN SPEED
Job Description: Ensure the execution of trade marketing activities to maximize revenue and strengthen brand presence at the point of sale. Facilitate effective coordination between the marketing and sales teams to achieve business objectives. Trade Marketing Planning: Develop and implement trade marketing strategies and campaigns for beverage products at retail and distribution points. Create detailed budgets for trade marketing activities and ensure cost efficiency and alignment with objectives. Evaluate the effectiveness of trade marketing programs and propose enhancements for future campaigns. Collaboration with Sales Teams: Work closely with sales teams to execute strategies and promotional programs that drive sales growth. Analyze sales performance data and market feedback to optimize trade marketing initiatives. POSM and Product Display Management: Design and manage Point-of-Sale Materials (POSM) to enhance brand visibility and customer engagement. Ensure product displays comply with brand standards and effectively capture shopper attention. Market Research and Competitor Analysis: Collect and analyze market insights, shopper behavior, and competitor activities. Use data-driven insights to support the development of effective trade marketing strategies. Event Support and Activation: Plan and participate in retail events, in-store promotions, and brand activation programs to boost product awareness. Coordinate with external partners and vendors to ensure successful event execution.
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. At least 1-2 years of experience in trade marketing, preferably in the FMCG or beverage industry. Strong planning and organizational skills. Analytical skills for data interpretation and performance evaluation. Excellent communication and teamwork abilities. Creativity and problem-solving skills in designing impactful trade marketing campaigns. Proficiency in English (written and spoken) is a plus. Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). Familiarity with basic design tools (Photoshop, Illustrator) is an advantage. Opportunity to work in a dynamic and professional environment. Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses. Health insurance and other benefits in line with labor laws. Opportunities for career advancement and professional training programs. Note: 6 months contract
Industry: Hàng gia dụng / Chăm sóc cá nhân , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống , Tiếp thị / Marketing

Company: Công Ty TNHH CJ Foods Việt Nam
Job Description: Demand Forecasting Partner with the Commercial team (including Marketing, Trade Marketing, Customer Service-Sales Operations, and Sales) and Finance teams to generate precise demand forecasts for assigned categories. Leverage historical data, market trends, and sales insights to predict customer demand accurately. Inventory Management Oversee inventory levels to ensure alignment with forecasted demand while avoiding excess stock and minimizing the risk of shortages. Implement strategies to balance inventory turnover rates and optimize stock levels. Performance Monitoring Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) such as Forecast Accuracy (FA), Forecast Bias (FB), Out-of-Stock (OOS) incidents, (SLOB), and Days of Inventory (DOI). Assess the effectiveness of the Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP) process and make data-driven decisions to enhance performance. Planning Conduct comprehensive scenario analyses to evaluate various supply chain scenarios. Develop and implement contingency plans to address and adapt to evolving market conditions and unexpected disruptions. Other tasks are assigned by Line Manager.
Job Requirements: Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management or a related field, or a demonstrated passion for supply chain management. Experience: Minimum of 03-4 years of progressive experience in Demand Planning/Supply Planning/Inventory Control Senior level Supply Chain Expertise: Extensive knowledge of demand forecasting, inventory management, production planning, and overall supply chain processes. Language Skills: Proficiency in written and spoken English (Prefer) Soft Skills: Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze data, identify trends, and derive actionable insights. Communication & Collaboration: Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to effectively communicate and collaborate across various teams. Adaptability & Problem-Solving: Capacity to adapt to changing environments and address complex problems with innovative solutions.
Industry: Hàng gia dụng / Chăm sóc cá nhân , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống , Xuất nhập khẩu

Job Title: Unit Head of Digital Business Intelligence & Sales planning
Company: CÔNG TY TÀI CHÍNH TNHH NGÂN HÀNG TMCP SÀI GÒN - HÀ NỘI  (SHBFinance)
Job Description: - Hợp tác với các bộ phận Tài chính, Quản lý Danh mục, Quản lý và phát triển giá trị khách hàng và Rủi ro để phát triển và triển khai các kế hoạch kinh doanh nhằm đạt được mục tiêu về doanh số, lợi nhuận, rủi ro và chất lượng danh mục . Partner with Finance, Portfolio, Customer Value Management, Risk Division to develop and implement strategic digital sales plans to achieve digital sales volume, PnL, Risk and quality of portfolio targets - Xác định và đánh giá tác động của toàn bộ vòng đời kinh doanh số, bao gồm các nguồn tăng trưởng và hiệu suất của ứng dụng bán hàng, như tỷ lệ giữ chân người dùng và khả năng tạo doanh thu. Define and analyze the full lifecycle impact of digital business, including growth sources and mobile app performance, such as user retention and monetization. - Đề xuất các chiến lược và chiến thuật bán hàng mới dựa trên phân tích dữ liệu nhằm cải thiện việc thu hút và giữ chân khách hàng, đồng thời thúc đẩy tăng trưởng kinh doanh tổng thể. Recommend new sales strategies and tactics based on data-driven analysis to enhance customer acquisition and retention and overall business growth. - Đưa ra dự báo doanh số, kế hoạch dự tính và các thông tin chi tiết có thể triển khai để nâng cao kết quả bán hàng. Provide sales forecasts, projections, and actionable insights to improve sales outcomes. - Theo dõi và không ngừng cải thiện các chỉ số hiệu quả kinh doanh, đảm bảo độ chính xác của dữ liệu trong mọi báo cáo và hệ thống phân tích kinh doanh. Monitor and continuously improve sales performance metrics, ensuring data accuracy across all reports and business intelligence systems. - Hợp tác với các đội ngũ tiếp thị, sản phẩm và bán hàng để điều chỉnh các chiến lược bán hàng dựa trên dữ liệu phù hợp với các mục tiêu kinh doanh tổng thể. Collaborate with marketing, product, and sales teams to align data-driven sales strategies with overall business objectives. - Quản lý và cập nhật các bảng theo dõi hiệu suất và báo cáo để trình bày cho ban lãnh đạo. Maintain and update performance dashboards and reports for leadership review. - Tiến hành nghiên cứu thị trường và phân tích đối thủ để cung cấp thông tin cho việc lập kế hoạch bán hàng và chiến lược định vị cạnh tranh. Conduct market research and competitor analysis to inform sales planning and competitive positioning. - Phối hợp với IT để đảm bảo theo dõi dữ liệu chính xác và chịu trách nhiệm về vòng đời dữ liệu bán hàng số, từ việc thu hút khách hàng đến giữ chân và tạo doanh thu. Collaborate with IT to ensure accurate data tracking and own the digital sales data lifecycle from acquisition to retention and monetization.

Các chuyên ngành Kinh Tế, Ngân hàng, Marketing, Công nghệ/ BA or Master (preferred). Major: Economic, Banking, Marketing, Technology 2. Company: VIETNAM GOBUY E-COMMERCE - CÔNG TY TNHH THƯƠNG MẠI ĐIỆN TỬ GOBUY VIỆT NAM
Job Description: We are seeking an AI Engineer with a strong background in Natural Language Processing (NLP), Large Language Models (LLMs), and Computer Vision to develop intelligent solutions, particularly for chatbots, interaction automation, and image-based document processing Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, and optimize intelligent chatbots by integrating LLM technologies to enhance conversational ability and contextual understanding. Apply NLP techniques to extract information, analyze text, and build language data processing pipelines. Develop computer vision solutions for chatbot-related systems, such as image-based information extraction (OCR), document/form parsing, and image search. Integrate AI models into backend systems, APIs, or other platforms. Package and deploy solutions in production environments using Docker and Kubernetes. Collaborate with relevant teams to understand business requirements and propose suitable technical solutions. Maintain, improve, clean, and manipulate data; troubleshoot and resolve existing issues. Continuously monitor, evaluate, and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies in LLM, NLP, and Computer Vision.
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Information Technology, Applied Mathematics, Electronics & Telecommunications, or a related field. At least 3 years of experience in a similar role. Hands-on experience in developing chatbots or natural language interaction systems. Strong knowledge of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Large Language Models (LLMs), such as GPT, Claude, LLaMA, etc. Experience with frameworks like Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, or similar. Knowledge or experience in computer vision or OCR. Proficient in Python and popular AI/ML libraries (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit-learn). Experience working with SQL databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.) and Vector Databases like Redis, Qdrant. Experience with containerization platforms (Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus. Strong logical thinking, problem-solving skills, and a fast learning ability. Preferred (Not Required): Experience deploying AI products into production (cloud deployment, API integration, etc.). Experience working with Vietnamese language data is a plus. Understanding of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems and vector search. Ability to write technical documentation or user guides for models. Benefits Competitive salary and benefits, negotiated based on skills and experience. Social insurance contributions are based on the full gross salary. Full compliance with Vietnam Labor Law, including contributions to social, health, and unemployment insurance. Annual leave and public holiday entitlements according to the regulations of the Vietnamese government. A dynamic, professional, and friendly work environment with ample opportunities for growth and advancement. Working Hours: Monday to Saturday Monday to Friday: from 08:30 to 17:30. Saturday: from 09:00 to 17:00.
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Oxford University Clinical Research Unit (OUCRU Vietnam)
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: JOB SUMMARY In collaboration with the University of Oxford, MORU, Menzies, WEHI, and the National Malaria Control Programs (NMCPs) in Vietnam, Laos PDR, and Cambodia, OUCRU is conducting several regional projects focused on the genetic epidemiology of drug-resistant malaria parasites, asymptomatic malaria monitoring, and sero-surveillance to support local and regional malaria control and elimination efforts. The next phase of these projects will focus on capacity building—supporting NMCPs in malaria molecular testing and data analysis to advance national malaria elimination goals and ensure long-term sustainability. We are seeking a Senior Research Assistant to provide technical and data analysis training to NMCPs, ensuring the effective delivery of hands-on laboratory and analytical skills. The role will also involve performing and optimizing molecular and serology laboratory assays, analyzing project data, and contributing to research manuscripts and publications. This position will require frequent visits to malaria-endemic provinces and partner laboratories to support training. The successful candidate will work across ongoing malaria genetic projects and a pilot malaria serology study. * KEY TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES · Understand, comply with and follow research protocols and laboratory procedures · Providing technical and data analysis training sessions to local site staffs in malaria endemic provinces and international scientific partner staffs · Conduct and Optimize the new molecular, serology laboratory assays · Analyze project data and contribute to manuscript writing · Assist PIs in training junior staffs · Engage in frequent site visits to support local collaborators and field activities. · Other support tasks as required
Job Requirements: ESSENTIAL CRITERIA · MSc or PhD (preferable) in Molecular Biology, Bioinformatics, Immunology or a related field · At least 5 year-experience in NGS sequencing or serological laboratory work (both technical and analysis) · Ability to work with clinical samples · Strong data analysis skills (experience with R, or bioinformatics software is an advantage) · Excellent interpersonal skills, team working ability · Strong communication and training skills to engage with NMCP teams. · Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and able to work independently · Willingness to travel to malaria-endemic areas for fieldwork and training activities. · Proficient English skills (IELTS 7 or equivalent) DESIRABLE CRITERIA · Experience in clinical research, working with multiple partners · Vaccination of Hepatitis B · Interest in malaria research * BENEFITS · Contracted salary ranges: : $1,549 - $1,633 gross per month · Optional insurance: In-patient and out-patient medical coverage; Personal accident insurance coverage · Two months salary for annual bonus and clothes · Annual leave 18 days/year for the first year, a maximum of 30 days · Other responsibilities and benefits are based on Viet Nam Labor Law. * HOW TO APPLY Interested candidates are invited to send curriculum vitae, application and copies of relevant certificates, either by email or by post to Oxford University Clinical Research Unit Laboratory of Clinical Science Hospital for Tropical Diseases 764 Vo Van Kiet, Ward 1, District 5, HCMC * DEADLINE FOR SUBMISSION 26 March 2025 * We thank all applicants for their interest but only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.
Industry: Y tế / Chăm sóc sức khỏe / Thẩm mỹ / Làm đẹp , Phi chính phủ / Phi lợi nhuận

Company: Vietmap - Công ty Cổ phần Ứng Dụng Bản Đồ Việt
Job Description: We are seeking E-commerce Sales Leader with the following key responsibilities: Develop and execute sales plans (monthly/quarterly/annual), including revenue targets, pricing strategies, promotions, and marketing campaigns across e-commerce platforms (Shopee, Lazada, Tiki, TikTok Shop, website, etc.). Forecast sales performance based on historical data, market trends, and promotional activities to ensure sales targets and optimal inventory management. Monitor and optimize shop performance: traffic, conversion rate (CR), average order value (AOV), return rate, ensuring revenue maximization. Collaborate with the Marketing team to implement platform advertising campaigns (Shopee Ads, Lazada Sponsored Search, TikTok Ads, …) and optimize Ads spending. Manage inventory planning, ensuring appropriate stock levels to prevent overstocking or stockouts. Track order fulfillment status, ensuring smooth processing, monitoring shipping lead time, return rate, and improving customer shopping experience. Work closely with the e-commerce platforms to negotiate promotions and participate in platform-supported campaigns. Train and oversee the direct sales team, ensure high-quality customer engagement and conversion optimization. Coordinate with the design & content team to optimize product listings, images, descriptions, and videos for better engagement. Utilize data analytics tools (Google Analytics, Power BI, Excel, Looker Studio) to track performance, generate reports, and provide data-driven recommendations to improve sales.
Job Requirements: At least 3 years of experience in B2C e-commerce, with at least 1 year in a sales leadership role. Strong understanding of e-commerce platforms (Shopee, Lazada, Tiki, TikTok Shop, Amazon, etc.), including operation fee, ranking mechanisms, and advertising tools. Experience in sales planning and sales forecasting, ensuring optimal stock levels and revenue growth. Proficiency in data analysis tools (Google Analytics, Power BI, Looker Studio, CRM) to monitor sales performance. Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret key e-commerce metrics such as ROAS, ROI, AOV, CR, CPC, CPO and develop strategies for improvement. Experience in working with logistics & 3PL partners to ensure seamless inventory management and order fulfillment. Familiarity with graphic design & content editing tools like Photoshop and Canva is a plus. Good command of English (both written and verbal). Passion for automotive technology and car accessories is a plus.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: BUYMED LIMITED COMPANY
Job Description: Tech Lead will play a crucial role in improving user experience, optimizing transactions, and ensuring seamless order processing across our platform. You will lead a cross-functional team of engineers, collaborating closely with Product, UX/UI, and Data teams to build high-performance, scalable, and user-friendly solutions for our customers. Key Responsibilities: Technical Leadership – Own the architecture, development, and optimization of PDP, Checkout, and Dashboard to drive conversions and improve user engagement. Scalability & Performance – Ensure fast load times, reliable order processing, and a seamless checkout experience for thousands of daily transactions. Collaboration – Work closely with Product, UX/UI, Data, and Engineering teams to create intuitive and data-driven customer experiences. Mentorship & Code Quality – Lead by example, conducting code reviews, mentoring engineers, and driving a culture of technical excellence. System Design & Innovation – Continuously improve Buymed’s PDP, checkout, payments, and customer dashboard, integrating the latest technologies and best practices. Monitoring & Troubleshooting – Ensure high availability, reliability, and bug-free experiences across core purchasing flows.
Job Requirements: Must-Have: 5+ years of software engineering experience, with at least 2 years in a Tech Lead role. Proficiency in backend and frontend technologies, such as React, Golang Experience building & maintaining scalable microservices, API design, and GCP Deep understanding of performance optimization, caching strategies, and high-traffic database scaling Experience leading cross-functional teams and driving technical roadmaps. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to make data-driven product decisions. Proven ability to lead a squad focused on continuous improvement, dev & QA automation, and increasing dev efficiency/throughput. Nice-to-Have: Experience in eCommerce, B2B marketplaces, or fintech platforms. Familiarity with A/B testing, analytics, and personalization for improving user engagement. Exposure to GraphQL, event-driven architectures, or AI-powered recommendations. Prior experience optimizing PDP and checkout.
Industry: Dược phẩm/ Hóa Mỹ Phẩm , CNTT - Phần mềm , CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng

Company: Saint-Gobain Vietnam
Job Description: Ensure the implementation and maintenance of safety, health, and environmental requirements according to Saint-Gobain standards, ISO 14001, and BS OHSAS 18001 systems. Ensure incoming materials are controlled according to the standards applied at the factory. Control the production process in various areas and ensure product quality on the production line. Collaborate with the Production Shift Leader to enhance production efficiency based on QPC and related technical methods to ensure goods are produced according to the correct process and technical specifications that meet the applied standards. Participate in resolving incidents (related to machinery, materials) during the shift. Prepare incident reports using WCM tools, proposing solutions in each incident report. Notify the direct manager and Production Assistant Managers (or shift leader) if there are any abnormal parameters regarding equipment and materials. Monitor the production plan to provide appropriate operating formulas such as: materials used, forming speed, etc. Conduct trials of new products/new production processes as required by superiors. Prepare trial reports. Additionally, implement, train, and supervise the production department in process control methods, production processes, when changing materials, new products. Research and understand the installation of new equipment, replacement/repair equipment, or conversion of production processes. Objective: to understand potential future equipment failures that could affect product quality to plan for prevention and improvement. Optimize energy usage (electricity, gas) by implementing and monitoring related projects (reducing water usage in the production process, optimizing sheet weight, etc.). Establish production processes, quality control processes, incident handling processes, and provide implementation guidelines for relevant departments (QC, Production, WH, etc.). Ensure product quality is maintained by implementing and managing quality control systems: ISO 9001, TPCQ. Update monthly data on TPQC PILLAR (quality & process control). Check that operators comply with production processes, quality control processes at various stages/areas. Document if they do not comply with the requirements that have been transferred and trained. Perform other tasks related to the PQC department and other tasks outside the department as required by superiors.
Job Requirements: Education: Graduated from College/University in related majors. At least one year of relevant experience, preferably from heavy industry. Technical Competencies: Major in construction materials, silicate materials, or equivalent fields. Communication skills Statistical data analysis skills Teamwork skills Report writing skills Time and task management skills Good level of English proficiency is highly preferred. Creative, proactive, responsible, positive, adaptable, flexible, sharp Passionate about research, dynamic, enthusiastic in work, eager to learn, professional working style
Industry: Cơ khí / Ô tô / Tự động hóa , Hóa học , Xây dựng

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be in the top 1% retailers on Amazon US. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 400 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only Amazon‘s sporting goods market but also to enter new e-commerce markets from many regions like Canada, Europe, Japan. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS 1. Data Collection and Analysis Gather data from various sources (sales, marketing, customer behavior) and conduct detailed analyses to identify trends and insights. 2. Report Generation Create and maintain regular reports and dashboards that provide actionable insights to stakeholders. 3. Support Decision-Making Provide data-driven recommendations to support strategic and operational decisions. 4. Data Quality Ensure data integrity and accuracy by performing regular data quality checks and troubleshooting any issues. 5. Collaboration Work closely with other departments (e.g., marketing, sales, technology) to understand their data needs and deliver relevant insights. 6. Tool Utilization Utilize BI tools and software (Power BI) to create visualizations and reports.
Job Requirements: II. SKILL AND EXPERIENCE At least 3 years’ experience in Business Intelligence or relevant role; Bachelor’s degree and above in Statistics, Business, Data Analytics, and other related fields; Strong in SQL skills; Have experience in using Python is a big plus; Ability to demonstrate a high level of verbal and written to coordinate with internal stakeholders across departments; Be opened minded, think out of the box and willing to do attitude; Experience in business intelligence in E-commerce/Fintech companies is a plus; Having knowledge in Logistics, Operation or Marketing is a plus; Entrepreneurial spirit and start-up mindset. III. WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US? FOR YOU TO JOIN Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances. Salary review: annually or on excellent performance. Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events. Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year. Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package. Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration. FOR YOU TO GROW Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge. Challenges : Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work. Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry. FOR YOU TO STAY People : Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication. Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best. Career path : Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , Ngành khác

Company: HEINEKEN Vietnam
Job Description: We are on the hunt for a brilliant Innovation Product Owner to join our team and help us drive forward with some out-of-the-box thinking and ideas. As the Innovation Product Owner, you will be responsible for leading the charge on innovative product development, leveraging emerging technologies and pushing the boundaries of what's possible. In fact, we’re looking for someone who can make an impact to the market of food & beverage itself, in (several) innovative projects that connect end consumers and b2b customers. Responsibilities: Shape the value: Identify needs & gaps from current market and its distribution, internal stakeholders, and referrable oceans… to create values for the organization through initiations of new digital products, platforms, and technologies. Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to ensure that innovative products and services align with the company's overall strategy and goals. Own the journeys : You create and define journeys for our end consumers, but also to connect them with the ecosystem of our organization. We don’t digitalize clumsy processes, but bring them to the next level (perhaps having less processes is actually better – it’s your call) Deliver stuff, digital stuff: Lead (and own the success of) the development of those innovative product ideas and concepts, leveraging emerging technologies and trends (either from the market or Heineken Global). Development teams can be in-house, our Innovation dev hub, or external partner and Global partner, or can buy / rent a technology entirely. It’s up to you! Understand the customers / users: Develop a deep understanding of customer needs and preferences and use this knowledge to drive the development of products that resonate with our target audience. Depending on projects, users can be a normal beer drinker, or an accountant doing manual work, or a retail owner who barely knows about tech & app. That’s the exciting part of the job. Be the connector: Work closely with cross-functional teams to plan and execute the development of innovative products and services, using Agile methodologies and tools. Champion the Innovation: Keep in touch with the world to identify trends, technology and opportunities in the market, and use this information to inform product development decisions. Live by data: Use data and analytics to track the performance of innovative products and services, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions. Some of your projects might generate invaluable data as well. Fun fact: you can work with a lot of 1st party data, and pionner the transformation game of extracting values from data.
Job Requirements: Requirements: 7-10 years of experience as a Digital Product Owner or similar role, with a proven track record of delivering digital products, services or transformation. A business domain regarding FMCG, Finance, HR, Process control & Improvement, Legal… is a plus. Strong process improvement & process design skill. Six Sigma and similar technique proficiency is a plus. Strong leadership skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate cross-functional teams to achieve shared goals. In fact, you need to shape your story and convince people to follow! Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with stakeholders across the organization. Excellent project management skill, capable of driving projects from initiation to closing - sprinkled some pilots here and pivots there. Good financial & commercial skillset (and mindset). At least you can sell your project with a sufficiently good business case. Experience working in an Agile environment, with a relatively thorough understanding of Agile methodologies and tools. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to use data to drive decisions. A passion for emerging technologies and trends, with a strong understanding of the latest developments in the market. If you're a creative problem solver with a passion for innovation, we want to hear from you! As our Innovation Product Owner, you'll have the opportunity to work on some truly cutting-edge projects and help us to stay at the forefront of our industry. So, if you're ready to take your career to the next level and join a team that's always pushing the boundaries, apply today and let's get started!
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm
