Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be the world leader in e-commerce enablers in term of trading, product creating and e-commerce servicing. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 500 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only US e-commerce market but also to enter new e-commerce markets of more than 15 countries in Europe, Asia and North America, not only Amazon channel but also Walmart, Wayfair among others. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently. Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS Merchandising Operations Management Oversee the creation, editing, and management of product listings across e-commerce platforms (Amazon, Shopify, etc.). Automate merchandising workflows to enhance efficiency and accuracy. Ensure product listings are optimized for SEO, conversion rates, and platform-specific best practices. Manage digital assets, pricing updates, and inventory synchronization. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve merchandising strategies and drive sales growth. Promotion Operations Digitalization Develop and implement automation strategies for managing digital promotions and discounts. Optimize promotional campaigns based on real-time data and performance insights. Ensure seamless execution of promotions across multiple platforms while maintaining brand consistency. Work closely with marketing, sales, and analytics teams to enhance promotional effectiveness. Leverage AI-driven tools to forecast promotional performance and customer engagement. Programmatic Advertising Automation Develop and implement strategies to automate advertising campaigns across digital platforms. Optimize programmatic advertising campaigns using data-driven insights to improve ROAS and efficiency. Work closely with data teams to leverage AI/ML models for real-time bid adjustments and audience targeting. Monitor ad performance and troubleshoot issues related to automation and optimization. Collaborate with marketing and analytics teams to integrate advertising automation into the broader digital strategy.
Job Requirements: Knowledge Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Skills Strong project management and problem-solving abilities. Proven capability to collaborate across teams and drive digital transformation initiatives. Excellent English writing skills with strong documentation capabilities. Experience Minimum of 5 years of experience in digital marketing, programmatic advertising, e-commerce operations, or promotion management. In-depth understanding of advertising platforms such as Google Ads, Amazon DSP, Meta Ads, and programmatic bidding strategies. Hands-on experience with automation tools for digital marketing, merchandising, and promotions, including API integrations, feed management, and AI-driven optimization solutions. Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Google Analytics, Tableau, and Power BI. Familiarity with SQL or Python is a plus.

Company: Highlands Coffee
Job Description: Summary: The FP&A Manager is responsible for establishing and managing a robust financial budgeting, planning, analysis and forecasting process for the Company. This role involves collaborating with department heads to develop and execute financial plans, budgets, and forecasts that align with the overall business strategy. The FP&A Manager will also provide valuable insights, financial analyses, and recommendations for long-term financial planning and strategic decision-making to optimize financial performance. Key Accountabilities: Financial Analysis and Forecasting: Lead the financial analysis & forecasting process to analyze all financial aspects affecting profitability & business performance, improving forecast accuracy & proposing recommendations for profit maximization and sustainability. Analyze and articulate the drivers of organizational performance through interpretation of financial results and macro-economic trends to support strategic planning and decision-making. Collaborate with department heads to gather data and develop departmental forecasts, ensuring alignment with overall financial goals. Assist in preparing comprehensive business updates and decks to facilitate strategic planning for senior leadership. Manage financial databases by organizing and analyzing diverse data sources, consolidating Profit and Loss statements by channels and formats. Lead both consolidated and segment financial monthly rolling forecasts, including P&L, balance sheet, and cash flow. Financial Planning & Budgeting: Assist the Head of FP&A in developing & maintaining the end-to-end short- and long-term planning processes for Highlands operations, driving effective monthly financial forecasting, reporting processes (including MFR’s), and long-term planning that aligns with Highlands’ business strategic objective. Implement the annual financial budgeting process to ensure alignment with corporate strategy and overall business goals. Collaborate with department heads and senior management to develop annual budgets in alignment with the company strategy goals. Manage and control Store Opex and BU G&A Budgets, defining metrics to evaluate performance against forecasts and goals. Capital Planning and Cost Controlling Assist in capital management and optimize the cash conversion cycle to align the company’s short-term and long-term financing needs with its financial strategy. Evaluate & prioritize capital investments based on potential returns and strategic alignment. Determine the optimal allocation of financial resources across different departments or projects. Implement systems to govern cost control and review departmental accrual expenses, tracking performance against plans. Collaborate with the Accounting Team to manage cash flow and balance sheet, ensuring accurate and timely financial transactions. Reporting and Performance Management Manage all financial reports, including Monthly MFR, QBR, Board Meeting materials, and corporate reporting (JFC and VTI). Analyze financial data to identify trends, risks, and opportunities for improvement. Develop and maintain financial models to support strategic decision-making and conduct scenario analyses for potential impacts of various business decisions across all functions, except Supply Chain and Commercial. Continuously enhance financial reporting and drive business review processes. Lead special projects as designed and defined by the CFO such as digital transformation, finance transformation.
Job Requirements: Job Requirements: 07+ years of experience in financial planning and analysis, budgeting, and forecasting, preferably in the retail or consumer products industry. Proven experience in a managerial role within a finance function, preferably in a corporate environment. Strong financial modeling and analytical skills. Proficient in financial analysis tools and software. Strong proficiency in financial modeling, data analysis, and business intelligence tools (e.g., Excel, SQL, Tableau, Power BI). Excellent organization skills and ability to effectively manage multiple priorities in a rapidly changing environment. Strong presentation & communication skills with the ability to effectively communicate complex financial information to non-financial stakeholders.
Industry: Kế toán / Kiểm toán , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Job Title: [AEON Long An] Quản lý cửa hàng Chăm sóc sức khỏe và sắc đẹp - Glam Beautique
Company: Công Ty TNHH Aeon Việt Nam
Job Description: 1/ Operations duties a. Merchandise management - Supervise Group Leader(s) and General Staff to ensure: • Merchandise is fully replenished, in good conditions & quality. • All the display merchandise is according to schematic plan and all the price between display merchandise and price card is tally. • Changing price label (if necessary) is completed before store opens. - Order stock directly with Suppliers and receive stock from MMD. - Verify and approve inventory orders raised by Group Leader(s). - Plan manpower, prepare and attend bi-annually Stock Take as scheduled. - Support Foodline with monthly Stock Take as directed by supervisor. - Plan, assign duties for Group Leader(s) and General Staff to make necessary preparation for Membership Day & Mommy Day and Public Holidays. b. Non-merchandise management - Supervise Group Leader(s) and General Staff to ensure: • Operational equipment, lighting and fixtures (gondola, wagon, shelves, etc.) are in good conditions • Sales floor is kept clean & tidy • All backrooms are locked in good conditions • POP execution is carried out properly • Fire safety procedure is carried out properly - Check and verify variances in stock & sales figures after Stock Take and make report to Line Manager. - Execute store opening & closing as directed by supervisor. c. Customer service - Provide good customer services to encourage “plus selling”. Be polite and listen alternatively to customer needs. - Get information and introduce to customers about new arrivals, promotions, policies regarding to payment, returns/exchanges, etc. - Handle customer complaints raised by Group Leader(s), difficult and complicated sales. - Follow Company’s Rules on Customer Service (greeting, smiling, bowing and attitude towards customers). d. Omni channel Operation - Control stock inventory for Omni sales. - Report and ensure correct related figure data 2/ Sales and Profits - Analyze Sales by item/categoty and Customer behavior to propose a sastisfying selling floor/ event - Brief Group Leader(s) on yesterday sales achievement, today sales budget, up-to-date sales achievement, promotion and company updates. - Brief promoters on promotion scheme. - Breakdown the sales target given by Line Manager to each Group Leader and take responsibilities for sales target achievement of the division. - Overall plan and supervise the execution of promotion schemes. - Observe/gather information/suggestion from Group Leader(s) about sales trend, customer demands and advise Merchandising Dept. for any changes/improvement in merchandise assortment, quality and quantity. - Gather and consolidate all periodical reports from Group Leader(s) about top sales, promotion sales results, market survey/competitor survey and submit to Line Manager. 3/ Manpower management - Plan Monthly Division’s duty roster and manpower schedule. - Ensure sufficient manpower during business in ad-hoc situations. - Monitor Group Leader(s), General Staff and Promoter’s attendance and attire. - Approve duty roster, shift plan raised by Group Leader(s). - Be responsible for Group Leader(s) and General Staff’s performance. - Take part in recruitment & selection activities for Division’s staffing. - Motivate, training and develop staff in order to encourage their professional development. - Identify potential staff for succession planning purposes. - Build and promote team work spirit.
Job Requirements: University/College degree. Service orientation: customer service minded. At least 03 years related experience in retailing business or supermarket environment and 01 year experience in managing a team of at least 5 staffs Strong leadership and excellent relationship management. Strong analytical skill, good at data/figures. Good presentation, problem solving and sales skills. Self-disciplined with ability to work independently. Good command of spoken and written English Computer skill (Word, Excel, Powerpoint). Teamwork skill: Actively promote team work. Ability to cope with stressful situation at work.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Y tế / Chăm sóc sức khỏe / Thẩm mỹ / Làm đẹp

Company: Công Ty CP Vàng Bạc Đá Quý Phú Nhuận - PNJ
Job Description: The CX Leader will oversee and drive all customer experience (CX) projects, ensuring a seamless and exceptional customer journey across all touchpoints. This role requires a strategic thinker with a passion for creating impactful CX initiatives and the ability to lead cross-functional teams to deliver results aligned with the company's vision and customer-centric values. 1. Project Oversight and Management Lead and oversee the execution of CX projects from conception to completion.Define project scope, deliverables, and KPIs to measure the success of CX initiatives. Monitor project timelines, budgets, and resources to ensure timely and cost-effective delivery. Collaborate with internal teams, such as marketing, operations, and sales, to ensure seamless execution of CX projects. 2. Customer Insights and Data Analysis Collect and analyze customer feedback, surveys, and behavioral data to identify trends and insights. Utilize data to design and implement customer-centric solutions and improvements. Report on CX metrics such as NPS, CSAT, customer retention, and engagement to evaluate project effectiveness. 3. Team Leadership and Collaboration Manage and guide a team of CX professionals to deliver high-quality projects and initiatives. Facilitate collaboration between departments to ensure consistency in delivering customer experiences. Provide training and support to employees on CX best practices and standards. 4. Innovation and Continuous Improvement Stay updated on emerging CX trends, technologies, and best practices to maintain a competitive edge. Benchmark against industry leaders and competitors to introduce innovative CX solutions. Continuously review and optimize processes and touchpoints to elevate the customer experience.
Job Requirements: Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Customer Experience, or a related field. Master’s degree is a plus. Experience: 5+ years of experience in customer experience management, project management, or a related role, preferably in retail or consumer-facing industries. Proven track record of successfully managing CX initiatives and delivering measurable results. Skills and Competencies: Strong project management and organizational skills, with experience using tools such as Asana, Trello, or similar platforms. Analytical mindset with expertise in data analysis and interpretation. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills to influence stakeholders at all levels. Creative problem-solving abilities with a focus on customer-centric solutions. Knowledge of CX metrics and frameworks (e.g., NPS, CSAT, CES). Key Competencies Leadership: Ability to inspire and lead cross-functional teams effectively. Strategic Thinking: Capacity to align CX strategies with business objectives. Customer-Centricity: Passionate about understanding and exceeding customer expectations. Adaptability: Thrives in a dynamic environment and embraces change.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Dịch vụ khách hàng

Company: ASIAN TRAILS - CÔNG TY TNHH DU LỊCH ĐƯỜNG MÒN CHÂU Á
Job Description: About the role: The Sourcing Accommodation Manager is responsible for leading the Vietnam Accommodation Team, overseeing accommodation contracts, and executing effective contracting strategies. This role involves supporting the team on managing a diverse portfolio of hotels, negotiating competitive rates, and fostering strong relationships with hotel partners. The Accommodation Manager will also drive continuous process improvements and represent the team in strategic discussions and meetings. Responsibilities: Team Leadership and Management o Lead and supervise the Vietnam Accommodation Team, providing clear direction to ensure alignment with strategic goals. o Motivate and develop team members to achieve high performance and meet project deadlines. o Promote a collaborative and positive team environment, encouraging effective communication and teamwork. Strategic Contracting and Portfolio Management o Develop and implement contracting strategies to enhance and optimize the hotel portfolios in key destinations across Vietnam. o Negotiate competitive rates and favorable terms with hotel partners, securing exclusive deals and promotions. o Maintain strong relationships with existing hotel partners and establish connections with new ones. o Conduct regular evaluations of hotel partnerships and performance to ensure alignment with the company’s strategic objectives and contractual compliance. Project and Performance Management o Plan, manage, and monitor key accommodation-related projects, ensuring that objectives are met on time and within scope. o Identify and implement improvements in the contracting process to maximize efficiency and effectiveness. o Oversee the quality and relevance of contracted rates and promotions, ensuring competitiveness in the market. Market Insights and Data Analysis o Gather and analyze data on market trends, hotel performance, and competitive landscape to inform strategic decisions. o Prepare regular reports and presentations for Regional Sourcing Management, highlighting performance metrics and opportunities for growth. o Keep abreast of industry changes and competitor activities to make data-driven adjustments to strategies.
Job Requirements: Requirements: o Bachelor’s degree in Hospitality Management, Business Administration, or a related field. o Extensive experience in hotel contracting and accommodation management, ideally within the travel or hospitality sector in Vietnam. o Proven ability to lead and manage a team effectively. o Excellent negotiation and relationship management skills. o Strong proficiency in data analysis and reporting tools. o An ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines in a dynamic environment. o Fluency in English and Vietnamese is required. o Strong leadership and team management abilities. o Analytical mindset with a focus on continuous improvement. o Exceptional communication and negotiation skills. o Highly organized with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks. o Adaptability to fast-paced environments and changing priorities
Industry: Nhà hàng / Khách sạn , Du lịch

Job Title: Senior ESS Engineer (ERP/PLM - Engineering System Support)
Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: TTI Asia Engineering Services is expanding and will grow its local Vietnam Team to support the TTI Vietnam organizational growth. TTI Asia Engineering Services delivers services and support to TTI Engineering and Manufacturing organizations via Business Digital Transformations, staff training and development. It’s a Center of Expertise in Engineering methodologies, skillsets, digital tools and systems as well as business processes. Its 3 poles are Engineering Systems, Training & Development, and Product Design Services. In line with our strategy to further develop the Engineering Systems group, the Asia PLM group is looking to fill the role of Senior Engineer, Engineering Systems – NPD Support in Vietnam . The Asia Engineering Systems Support (ESS) team has been long established in Dongguan, PRC, and has developed a reputation of offering quality daily support to Business verticals within TTI Asia. Since 2023, ESS is regularly present in Vietnam to deliver face-to-face support and training to Vietnam organizations. This position will focus on the implementation and development of ESS support to different business units in Vietnam by communication, training, coaching, daily support… to drive best practice in usage of our systems platforms. The ideal candidate will be comfortable with a system environment while understanding mechanical or electrical engineering. The position will support the various TTI organizations around Ho Chi Minh City. The base office is expected to be at the TTI SHTP office. Weekly responsibilities will likely require 2 to 3 daily trips to other TTI facilities, either in Cuchi or Dau Giay areas. Main duty: 1. Engineering Systems – PLM (20%): To leverage PRC Engineering Systems teams for project-based supporting activities in the platforms: Teamcenter, TeamWorks & Prodea, Oracle & K2 Engineering systems - Data Entry - Engineering information check and goalkeeping in the platforms - Assistant to Engineering executions in the platforms - Assistant to Engineering documentations in the platforms 2. Engineering Systems – NPD Support (80%): To leverage PRC Engineering Systems teams for general platform supports: Teamcenter, TeamWorks & Prodea, Oracle & K2 Engineering systems - User helpdesk - User pain points or requirements gathering - Usage monitoring and reporting - Performance benchmarking & platform validation tests - Best practice deployment - Assistant to business analysis - User training and communication - Platform / Data maintenance - Assistant to continues improvement
Job Requirements: Requirements: - College degree - Below majors are all accepted: IT, Mechanical Engineering, Electronic Engineering, Mechatronic Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Automations - Two years of experience in any below responsibilities of working with an enterprise level digital platform: User helpdesk, System Administrator, System Trainer, Business Analyst, Process Improvement, Architect Designer. - Preferred in exposure to the usage of any MCAD or ECAD tools, project and product management - Ability to use MS office suite for data analysis and report or Power BI - The ability to remain up-to-date with the latest software developments. - Leadership, vendor and project management skills. - Analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills. - Good in English language Working Location: - Branch site in SHTP - District 9/ Củ Chi/Dau Giay.
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Mondelēz Kinh Đô Việt Nam
Job Description: 1. Technical Mastery - Be an expert in the technologies of the line. - Develop & teach operating procedures and ensure they are fully effective. - Develop forward plans for the technologies. 2. Capability building - Use systems to build capability of operators and technicians. - Develop and deliver training and skills improvements. - Ensure there is a high level of technical competence within the operating team. 3. Drive Process reliability and stability by solving the chronic problems on the line. - Understand and analyse process variability root causes and define systems to eliminate them. - Design and define critical process parameters and centrelines; track and ensure adherence to them. - Give technical confirmation to any request or project proposal that affects the process or equipment. - Increase the stability of the line to support the transition of traditional line teams to autonomous teams. 4. Be responsible for the validation of all process improvements and the establishment of revised basic conditions on the line. 7. Identify and lead the implementation of Productivity Improvement Projects 8. Drive Labor productivities improvement through line crews and process optimization 9. Be a Leader of the Future - Display the correct behaviours with the team and be seen as a leader of the area - Cover for Line Leader when needed 10. Identify and extend good practice to other lines. 11. Be responsible for quantity and quality requirements 12. Master of FI tools and IL6S methodologies to apply in daily job. 13. Be FI members or pillar members as required and responsible for implementation of IL6S in respective areas 13. Perform other tasks when required

Job Description: Affiliate Strategy & Planning: Research and analyze the affiliate marketing landscape, target audience, competitor activities, and company product offerings. Develop and implement comprehensive affiliate marketing strategies and plans aligned with overall business objectives and partner resources. Establish revenue and cost targets for each partner segment (Publishers, KOLs, KOCs, Influencers, etc.). Affiliate Network Development & Management: Identify, recruit, and manage a diverse network of high-performing affiliates, publishers, KOLs, KOCs, and influencers. Cultivate strong relationships with partners and provide ongoing support and communication. Develop and maintain a database of affiliate contacts and performance data. Negotiate contracts, commission structures, and other partnership agreements. Campaign Management: Plan and execute affiliate marketing campaigns across various platforms, with a focus on TikTok and e-commerce. Manage campaign budgets, timelines, and deliverables. Track and analyze campaign performance, identify areas for optimization, and provide regular reporting. E-Merchandising: Oversee product presentation and positioning on e-commerce platforms (website, TikTok Shop, etc.). Ensure consistent branding and optimal customer shopping experience. Manage product listings, promotions, and seasonal updates. Team Management: Lead, mentor, and develop a team of affiliate marketing professionals. Set clear performance expectations, provide regular feedback, and conduct performance reviews. Foster a collaborative and results-oriented team environment. Collaboration & Communication: Collaborate closely with internal teams (e.g., E-commerce, TikTok, Brand Marketing) to align affiliate activities with overall marketing strategies. Develop and deliver training materials and resources for affiliates. Organize events, workshops, and offline activities to engage and support the affiliate network. Reporting & Analysis: Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide regular reports on campaign performance and ROI. Analyze data to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement. Develop and implement strategies to optimize campaign performance and maximize revenue generation.

Strong understanding of the digital marketing landscape, particularly TikTok and e-commerce platforms. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Data-driven mindset with strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Experience in team management and leadership. Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and relevant marketing tools. Nice to have: Experience working with affiliate marketing platforms and software. Knowledge of performance marketing and tracking methodologies. Familiarity with various influencer marketing platforms and tools.

Job Title: CG Quản trị hệ thống và vận hành CSDL
Company: Ngân Hàng TMCP Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng - VPBANK
Job Description: Hướng tới mục tiêu đưa VPBank trở thành một trong những ngân hàng hàng đầu về quản trị và ứng dụng dữ liệu, nâng cao năng lực cạnh tranh trong kỷ nguyên số, VPBank tập trung xây dựng và vận hành ổn định nền tảng dữ liệu, ứng dụng kết quả phân tích dữ liệu vào hoạt động kinh doanh và tối ưu vận hành, tăng cường ứng dụng khoa học dữ liệu (AI) và công nghệ học máy (ML) cũng như thúc đẩy quá trình chuyển đổi dữ liệu trên nền tảng điện toán đám mây và triển khai chiến lược, sáng kiến dữ liệu, kiến trúc dữ liệu. Mỗi sản phẩm phần mềm cũng bao gồm phần infrastructure, application và database của nhiều hãng khác khác nhau như Microsoft, Oracle, IBM, SAP và các sản phẩm phần mềm open source. Các chuyên gia có nhiều năm kinh nghiệm với nhiều loại công nghệ khác nhau giúp xây dựng kế hoạch và cung cấp các giải pháp liên quan đến vận hành và phát triển các hệ thống từ phần hạ tầng đến tầng ứng dụng tương tác với người sử dụng ổn định, an toàn dữ liệu hàng ngày Chi tiết công việc: Vận hành infrastructure như tài nguyên phần cứng, kế hoạch tăng trưởng phần cứng và xây dựng kinh phí dự trù cho các năm, làm việc cùng với IT của VPBank đảm bảo an toàn hệ thống Vận hành và theo dõi hệ thống hàng ngày cho các hệ thống của Trung tâm nền tảng dữ liệu (DPC) với nhiều công nghệ khác nhau từ các hãng Microsoft, Oracle, SAP, IBM and Open Source Cùng với team Vận hành hệ thống và quản trị CSDL (SAO) phân tích. đánh giá và lự chọn giải pháp tối ưu các hệ thống của DPC Thực hiện xây dựng dashboards giúp tối ưu hóa công tác vận hành Chủ động nghiên cứu các công nghệ mới phục vụ cho việc tối ưu, giải quyết các khó khăn trong công việc
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp Đại học hoặc cao hơn liên quan đến 1 trong các ngành kinh tế, tài chính, ngân hàng, hoặc công nghệ thông tin, toán tin ứng dụng, ngoại thương… Có kinh nghiệm ở vai trò Kỹ sư vận hành các hệ thống hoặc vai trò tương đương Có kinh nghiệm với hệ điều hành linux, windows Server Có kinh nghiệm với các database như oracle, Sql server, db2 Có kinh nghiệm vận hành các hệ thống dữ liệu: Data Warehouse/ Data LakeHouse/ Data Product Có kinh nghiệm triển khai thực tế với các hệ thống IBM DWH, AWS, Databricks là 1 điểm cộng Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm vận hành hệ thống ETL jobs Kỹ năng phản biện logic Giao tiếp (lắng nghe, diễn đạt) tốt Quản lý công việc và thời gian Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề Kỹ năng làm việc độc lập và phối hợp nhóm. ​Quyền lợi: Thu nhập hấp dẫn, lương thưởng cạnh tranh theo năng lực (16-18 tháng lương/năm) Thưởng các Ngày lễ, Tết cạnh tranh Được vay ưu đãi với lãi suất hấp dẫn theo quy định của ngân hàng Chế độ ngày phép 12-18 ngày phép/năm theo cấp bậc Bảo hiểm sức khỏe VPBank care cho CBNV theo cấp bậc Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo tùy thuộc vào Khung đào tạo cho từng vị trí Thời gian làm việc: từ thứ 2 – thứ 6 & 02 sáng thứ 7/ tháng

Company: Vietmap - Công ty Cổ phần Ứng Dụng Bản Đồ Việt
Job Description: We are seeking General Marketing Executive with the following key responsibilities: 1. Develop and Execute IMC (Integrated Marketing Communication) Campaigns • Develop and manage integrated communication campaigns (IMC) to ensure brand consistency across all communication activities. • Enhance brand value and recognition through IMC and 360-degree marketing campaigns. • Analyze the characteristics and behavior of target audiences to create suitable content and select the right communication channels. • Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to execute detailed plans. 2. Execute 360-Degree Marketing Campaigns • Create detailed plans for each phase of the campaign, monitor progress, and adjust flexibly to optimize results. • Develop content and messaging tailored to different channels and audience segments, ensuring unified and engaging communication. • Work closely with content, design, and production teams to create diverse marketing assets. 3. Manage and Optimize Diverse Communication Channels • Understand the characteristics of various communication channels to select the most suitable ones for each campaign based on target audiences and brand objectives. • Stay updated on emerging media trends to refine strategies and enhance promotional efficiency. • Master key digital metrics (e.g., CTR, CPM, CPA, ROI) to monitor, operate, and adjust campaigns in real-time, ensuring maximum effectiveness. 4. Support Other Marketing Activities • Assist and collaborate with other departments in product promotion, internal communication, and company events. • Act as a bridge between internal teams to ensure all marketing activities align with the company's overall goals. 5. Budget Management and Performance Measurement • Work with the finance team to effectively manage marketing budgets, ensuring spending aligns with objectives and achieves optimal results. • Compile comprehensive campaign reports with specific performance metrics (KPIs) to evaluate effectiveness and propose improvements for future campaigns. 6. Market and Competitor Analysis • Monitor and analyze market trends and competitor activities to develop timely and appropriate marketing strategies. • Identify new opportunities and suggest improvements to marketing strategies based on data and customer feedback.
Job Requirements: • Experience: At least 3-5 years of experience in marketing, particularly in managing IMC and 360-degree marketing campaigns. • Comprehensive Marketing Knowledge: Strong understanding of diverse communication channels, both online and offline, with skills in managing and executing integrated campaigns. • Strategic Planning and Audience-Centric Thinking: Ability to develop long-term strategies based on deep audience insights and brand-building expertise. • Data Analysis and Measurement Skills: Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Google Analytics, Data Studio, and other measurement platforms, with the ability to convert data into actionable insights. • Communication and Teamwork Skills: Excellent communication skills and the ability to work closely with internal teams and external partners to achieve common objectives. • Creative and Flexible Thinking: Capable of generating creative ideas and adapting strategies to optimize campaign performance. • Preferred: Candidates with experience in the automotive, technology, or other industries requiring comprehensive marketing skills.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing

Company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN THƯƠNG MẠI DỊCH VỤ SẢN XUẤT HƯƠNG THỦY
Job Description: Responsibility: Analyzing historical sales data, market trends, and other relevant factors to create accurate predictions of future customer demand, collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather insights, and utilizing forecasting models to optimize inventory levels and support sales and operations planning by proactively identifying potential risks and opportunities in the market; essentially ensuring the right amount of product is available at the right time to meet customer needs. Key responsibilities may include: Data Analysis: Analyzing historical sales data, market trends, promotional activities, and other relevant data to develop accurate demand forecasts. Model Development: Creating and maintaining statistical forecasting models using advanced techniques to predict future demand patterns. Collaboration: Working closely with sales, marketing, operations, and supply chain teams to gather market insights, customer feedback, and align demand forecasts with production/shipment plans. Trend Identification: Monitoring market dynamics, economic factors to identify potential demand shifts and adjust forecasts accordingly. Sales & Operations Planning (S&OP): Participating in S&OP meetings to present demand forecasts and collaborate on inventory management strategies. Risk Assessment: Performing scenario analysis to identify potential risks and opportunities impacting demand and develop contingency plans. Forecast Monitoring: Regularly monitoring forecast accuracy, identifying deviations from actual demand, and taking corrective actions to improve future forecasting. Reporting and Communication: Presenting demand forecasts and insights to key stakeholders through clear and concise reports and presentations. Process Improvement: Identifying areas for improvement in the demand planning process and implementing new methodologies or tools to enhance forecast accuracy.
Job Requirements: Required Skills: Strong analytical skills with proficiency in data manipulation and statistical analysis techniques Expertise in forecasting methodologies (e.g., time series analysis, moving average, exponential smoothing) Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams Proficiency in demand planning software and tools Understanding of supply chain dynamics and inventory management principles Business acumen and ability to interpret market trends and economic factors
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Thời Trang & Mỹ Phẩm Duy Anh (DAFC)
Job Description: The CRM Supervisor will be responsible for overseeing the development and execution of the CRM strategy to foster customer loyalty, enhance customer experience, and increase retention in line with the luxury positioning of DAFC and all the brands within DAFC portfolio. This role involves leveraging customer data to create personalized communication, implementing trade promotion programs and customer engagement campaigns, and managing the loyalty program to drive high-value customer retention. Client Engagement: • Devise and implement tailored strategies for VIP clients and various membership levels to enhance their engagement and loyalty. • Maintain and nurture existing client relationships while actively reactivating sleeping clients. Data Management: • Utilize data-driven insights to segment the customer base for targeted marketing campaigns, enhancing client engagement and sales. • Conduct thorough data analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement. Client Experience Management: • Collaborate closely with brand, retail, and marketing teams to optimize every touchpoint with clients, both online and in-store. • Implement initiatives that ensure consistency and excellence in the client experience across all channels. • Develop and execute innovative client-focused programs and events. Trade Promotions & Events: • Plan and execute generic trade promotions, such as end-of-season sales, Black Friday, Tet, and more, to drive sales and engage clients. • Organize and manage trade events, including private sales and exclusive events, creating unique shopping experiences for our clients. Others: follow other requests and assignments from Line Manager based on business needs
Job Requirements: Qualification: • Bachelor’s degree Experience • Proven experience in CRM, preferably within the luxury retail sector • Customer connectedness and customer centric mindset • Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite • Good thinking about data and system integration • Problem solving skills • Communication and teamwork skills
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing

Company: Công Ty CP Vàng Bạc Đá Quý Phú Nhuận - PNJ
Job Description: MISSION The Head of Customer & Market Insights plays a critical role in driving data-driven decision-making across the organization. This position is responsible for: - Leading market research & customer insights to support brand marketing, enhance customer experience, and optimize product positioning. - Providing strategic insights, identify market opportunities, and support the expansion of new business verticals. This role ensures that customer and market intelligence translates into actionable business strategies, strengthening both brand marketing efforts and future business innovations. RESPONSIBILITIES 1. Market Research & Customer Insights Lead end-to-end market research projects (qualitative & quantitative) to support brand marketing strategies. Analyze consumer behavior, purchasing trends, and brand perception to enhance brand positioning. Track customer satisfaction, NPS (Net Promoter Score), and segmentation trends to refine marketing strategies. Leverage AI-driven analytics tools to generate real-time consumer insights. Provide strategic recommendations for marketing campaigns, customer engagement, and brand storytelling. 2. Business Intelligence & New Business Strategy Act as a strategic partner to New Business Heads, providing insights on market dynamics, customer demand, and competitor landscapes. Identify growth opportunities, emerging trends, and white-space markets to support new business development. Design and execute feasibility studies for new product launches or market entries. Develop data-backed go-to-market strategies, helping business units mitigate risks and optimize investments. 3. Competitive & Industry Intelligence Continuously monitor competitor movements, industry shifts, and emerging business models. Provide benchmarking reports to highlight key differentiators and market positioning gaps. Build forecasting models and predictive analytics to anticipate industry changes. 4. Cross-functional Collaboration & Data-Driven Decision Making Partner with cross-functional teams to ensure that insights are embedded into decision-making. Develop interactive dashboards & reporting systems to provide leadership teams with real-time business intelligence. Translate complex datasets into clear, actionable insights for both short-term tactical plans and long-term strategic growth. 5. Team Leadership & Innovation Lead a high-performing research & analytics team, fostering a culture of data-driven innovation. Ensure the adoption of cutting-edge research methodologies, AI-powered analytics, and digital tools. Champion a customer-first mindset within the organization.
Job Requirements: Education & Experience: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Marketing, Business, Data Science, Economics, or a related field. Minimum of 8 years of experience in market research, customer insights, or business intelligence, at least 2 years in a similar leadership role. Experience in retail, luxury, lifestyle, or FMCG industries is highly preferred. Skills & Competencies: Strong expertise in market research methodologies, customer segmentation, and brand analytics. Proven experience in data analytics, competitive intelligence, and business forecasting. Strategic thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to connect data insights to business decisions. Strong business acumen with experience in new market entry strategies & business model evaluation. Exceptional storytelling and presentation skills to communicate insights effectively to senior stakeholders. Leadership experience in managing and developing research & analytics teams. Proficiency in Power BI, Tableau, SQL, Python, Google Analytics, and AI-driven insights platforms. Preferred Qualifications: Experience working closely with new business teams or corporate strategy units. Knowledge of AI applications in customer insights and market forecasting. Bằng việc gửi hồ sơ ứng tuyển đến PNJ, tôi xác nhận đã đọc, hiểu rõ và đồng ý với Thông báo Chính sách thu thập và xử lý dữ liệu cá nhân của PNJ. Link Thông báo: bit.ly/nghidinh13
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tiếp thị / Marketing

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH DOCQUITY VIỆT NAM
Job Description: ABOUT DOCQUITY Docquity is Southeast Asia’s largest professional community of healthcare professionals. Our single-minded purpose is to build a trusted digital healthcare platform to elevate patient outcomes and, ultimately, build healthier lives. Docquity is Southeast Asia’s largest professional community of healthcare professionals. Our single-minded purpose is to build a trusted digital healthcare platform to elevate patient outcomes and, ultimately, build healthier lives. Docquity connects healthcare professionals to help them be more collaborative, productive, and impactful and partners with companies to reach, educate, and gain insights. Docquity has more than 350,000 healthcare professionals and has offices in India, Indonesia, the Philippines, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam, and Taiwan. SUMMARY Job Title: Account Intern Work Experience: From 06 months to 1 year experience in a similar position. Location: Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam Academic Qualification: Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Science, or a related field. RESPONSIBILITIES Leverage your industry-specific experience in healthcare (Pharmaceutical/Medical Device) and/or digital agency to understand client needs and deliver effective solutions. Data report processing: Extract data from dashboard and map to aligned report template. Demonstrate a basic understanding of reading reports and data, providing valuable insights to clients. Hotline Management: Make and receive calls to follow up with HCPs at every step of the completion process. Technical Issue Documentation: Recording and tracking tech issues reported by HCPs/Clients. Maintain and update internal and HCPs/Clients trackers for efficient project management. Provide support to the team on internal projects, deliverables, and presentations as required. Provide administrative support for billing and accounts-related processes.
Job Requirements: REQUIREMENTS Commitment to a 6-Month internship. From 06 months to 1 year experience in a similar position. Strong Microsoft Office tools (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) skills and ability to handle data reports. Diligence, attention to detail, and a proactive work attitude. Clear speaking voice with good communication skills. Fluency in English (both written and spoken) is a plus. Ability to multitask and prioritize workload effectively. Problem-solving mindset with the ability to identify and resolve basic technical issues.

Company: Công ty Cổ phần Sữa VitaDairy Việt Nam
Job Description: I. Trách nhiệm: 1/ Dẫn dắt và Quản lý Đội ngũ CRM: Bao gồm 1 chuyên viên CRM có kinh nghiệm và hiểu biết về Salesforce, 1 Data Engineer và 1 ML Engineer 2/ Xây dựng và triển khai các chiến lược CRM để tăng cường sự hài lòng và trung thành của khách hàng. 3/ Phát triển Chiến lược CRM: Xây dựng, tích hợp, ứng dụng các giải pháp công nghệ cải tiến vào hệ thống CRM nhằm khai thác dữ liệu khách hàng hiệu quả 4/ Tối ưu hóa Quy trình CRM: Đảm bảo các quy trình CRM được tối ưu hóa để đạt hiệu quả cao nhất. 5/ Phân tích và Báo cáo Dữ liệu Khách hàng: Sử dụng dữ liệu để phân tích hành vi khách hàng và đưa ra các quyết định chiến lược. 6/ Hợp tác với Các Bộ Phận Khác: Làm việc chặt chẽ với các bộ phận Marketing, Bán hàng và IT để đảm bảo các chiến lược CRM được thực hiện hiệu quả. 7/ Đào tạo và Phát triển Nhân viên: Đào tạo và phát triển đội ngũ CRM để nâng cao kỹ năng và hiệu suất làm việc.
Job Requirements: II. Yêu cầu: 1/ Kinh nghiệm: Ít nhất 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực CRM, với ít nhất 2 năm ở vị trí quản lý. 2/ Kiến thức về Salesforce: Hiểu biết sâu về Salesforce và các công cụ CRM khác. 3/ Kỹ năng Phân tích Dữ liệu: Kỹ năng phân tích dữ liệu mạnh mẽ để đưa ra các quyết định chiến lược. 4/ Kỹ năng Giao tiếp: Khả năng giao tiếp và làm việc nhóm tốt. 5/ Kỹ năng Lãnh đạo: Khả năng lãnh đạo và quản lý đội ngũ hiệu quả. III. Ưu tiên: 1/ Kinh nghiệm trong ngành FMCG: Hiểu biết về ngành hàng tiêu dùng nhanh. 2/ Kỹ năng Kỹ thuật: Kinh nghiệm làm việc với các công cụ và công nghệ liên quan đến CRM và dữ liệu.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Thống kê , CNTT - Phần mềm

Job Title: Chuyên viên chính/Chuyên viên cao cấp vận hành mô hình - Trung tâm Quản trị dữ liệu
Company: Ngân Hàng TMCP Tiên Phong (TPBank)
Job Description: Mục đích chức danh Nhân sự vận hành mô hình sẽ tiếp nhận các yêu cầu deploy mô hình ML từ team Data Scientist từ các đơn vị nghiệp vụ trong NH; chuyển đổi code phát triển thành code vận hành, ra đầu bài với team Data Engineer/DevOps để phát triển data pipeline; lên phương án tích hợp mô hình ML vào hệ thống vận hành/ứng dụng của NH; thiết lập cơ chế theo dõi và monitor hiệu năng của các mô hình ML đang được vận hành. Mô tả công việc Đưa các mô hình ML được đánh giá là có hiệu quả trên thực tế lên môi trường vận hành theo yêu cầu của đơn vị nghiệp vụ dựa trên tài liệu yêu cầu phát triển (BRD) (chuyển đổi code phát triển thành code vận hành hệ thống; phát triển API hoặc deploy mô hình trên platform chuyên dụng như IBM Cloud Paks for Data hoặc phối hợp với các đơn vị phát triển để tích hợp trực tiếp trên hệ thống vận hành/ứng dụng tại NH); Phối hợp với team Data Scientist trong NH để lên kế hoạch thực hiện hiệu chỉnh, bảo dưỡng mô hình ML trong trường hợp hiệu năng mô hình xuống dưới ngưỡng cho phép; Nghiên cứu, thử nghiệm, từng bước áp dụng quy trình CI/CD và thực hành MLOps trong vòng đời vận hành/phát triển của các mô hình ML (Continuous Delivery for Machine Learning – CD4ML) tại NH;
Job Requirements: a. Kinh nghiệm : Kinh nghiệm 02 năm trở lên trong lĩnh vực vận hành mô hình (MLOps); b. Yêu cầu chuyên môn : - Có kinh nghiệm/thực hành ở một trong các mảng sau: + Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các nền tảng commercial thông dụng trên thị trường để phát triển/vận hành mô hình ML như IBM Cloud Pak for Data, DataRobot, Alteryx v.v. hoặc các nền tảng open source như Kubeflow, MLFlow v.v.; ưu tiên ứng viên đã có kinh nghiệm thực hành trên nền tảng IBM Cloud Pak for Data; + Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ như Hadoop, Spark, Airflow, Kafka để xây dựng luồng xử lý dữ liệu (data pipeline) phục vụ vận hành mô hình ML; + Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng công cụ Containerization (như Docker), Software Orchestration (như Kubernetes); có kinh nghiệm sử dụng CI/CD tool như Jenkins, Gitlab; - Ưu tiên ứng viên có am hiểu về các thư viện thông dụng được sử dụng trong việc phát triển mô hình ML như Keras, PyTorch, Tensorflow, Scikit-learn; - Ưu tiên các ứng viên đã có kinh nghiệm làm việc tại các tổ chức tài chính/ngân hàng/các công ty công nghệ; - Các kỹ năng/yêu cầu khác: + Cẩn thận, tỉ mỉ, làm việc tốt dưới áp lực; có khả năng làm việc nhóm tốt; + Có khả năng tự tìm hiểu/tự nghiên cứu tốt; Quyền lợi Thử việc 100% lương cơ bản, tổng thu nhập 15-18 tháng/năm Thưởng dự án và thưởng cuối năm cao Môi trường làm việc sáng tạo, hiện đại, quản lý theo tiến độ và hiệu quả công việc, giờ làm việc linh hoạt Đội ngũ lãnh đạo thân thiện, hòa đồng, quan tâm đến sự phát triển của các cá nhân Nhân viên được đào đạo tận tình các kĩ năng mềm và nghiệp vụ chuyên sâu Không khí vui vẻ, đồng nghiệp trẻ trung, năng động Nhiều hoạt động tập thể lý thú và ý nghĩa: bóng đá, karaoke, đi phượt, du lịch, từ thiện hàng năm Trợ cấp thai sản cho nhân viên nữ Tổ chức khám sức khỏe tổng quát định kỳ hàng năm, mua thêm gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe cho nhân viên ngoài Bảo hiểm y tế
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư , CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Hotel Academy Vietnam
Job Description: 1. Job Summary The primary function of this role is to manage the entire admissions process for the Academy, ensuring effective recruitment, application management, and student enrollment. This role is crucial for meeting enrollment targets and maintaining high standards of service for prospective students and corporate partners. The Admissions Manager will work closely with the Dean, Marketing Manager, Head of Academic, Facilitators to support the Academy’s recruitment objectives and will monitor the effectiveness of admission processes by analyzing application data and statistics, with regular reports provided to the General Director and Dean. 2. Responsibilities · Student Recruitment: Manage and execute recruitment strategies to attract and enroll students in HAVN - VET by EHL programs. Oversee the full process of student admissions from initial inquiry to final enrollment. Achieve assigned recruitment targets through effective planning and execution. Corporate Sales: Develop and maintain relationships with corporate partners to facilitate program enrollment and promote tailored vocational training solutions. Application Processing: Manage the processing of student applications, ensuring accuracy, completeness, and adherence to deadlines. Gather necessary documents, references, and supporting materials. Student and Partner Care: Provide exceptional customer service to prospective students and corporate partners. Address inquiries, offer guidance, and support throughout the admission process. Data Management: Maintain and manage student data in compliance with relevant data protection regulations. Ensure accurate and up-to-date records for all applicants. Establish and continuously improve CRM systems and applicant tracking tools. Conversion Strategies: Implement follow-up campaigns and consultations to convert applications into enrollments. Scholarships and Financial Aid: Propose and manage information related to scholarships and financial aid options, ensure that relevant information is communicated effectively to potential students. Reporting and Analysis: Generate weekly reports and ad-hoc reports on admissions metrics, including application trends and conversion rates. Provide insights to the management team for strategic decision-making. Policy and Procedure Management: Develop, implement, and maintain admissions policies and procedures to ensure efficiency, fairness, and compliance with institutional standards and regulations. Team Management: Supervise, train and support the admissions team, delegate tasks, and track performance to ensure high standards of service and productivity. Event Management: Planning and implementation admissions events, including open days, information sessions, campus tours, etc. Work with the Marketing Team to produce promotional materials. Market Trends: Monitor industry trends and competitor activities to refine recruitment strategies and stay competitive in the vocational education market. Strategic Planning: Develop and execute comprehensive recruitment strategies and plans to meet the Academy’s enrolment targets. Regularly review and adjust strategies to ensure alignment with institutional goals. Additional Duties: Perform other related duties as assigned by the Dean/Chairman, aligned with the role's responsibilities and expertise. Promote and uphold the Academy’s values and mission in all interactions with prospective students and partners.
Job Requirements: Person Specification Requirements Over 5 years of experience in a similar position; experience in school marketing is advantageous but not required. IT proficient, with experience using MS Office applications such as Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Proven experience in admissions management or a related field, preferably within vocational or educational institutions. Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to provide excellent customer service and build effective relationships with students and corporate partners Proficiency in using and establishing CRM systems and applicant tracking tools to streamline admissions processes and analyze application data.
Industry: Giáo dục / Đào tạo

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH ATLAS COPCO VIỆT NAM
Job Description: Atlas Copco Vietnam (a Swedish air compressor company) is accelerating digital marketing and customer experience with CRM lead executive career opportunity. Mission of the role: · Ensure correct implementation and usage of CRM system as the single source of truth · Secure that CRM system is the main communication channel for customer-related matters · Actively maintain and utilize the CRM system · Be responsible for generating leads in all 4 dimensions (Inbound, Outbound, Internal and Sales) · Support and coordinate assigned activities and tasks in the organization within the scope of responsibility. Main responsibilities 1. Customer data analysis ₋ Qualify leads from Inbound activities on time and transfer the qualified leads to responsible sales engineers ₋ Analyze customer data to identify trends, insights, and opportunities for better lead generation and lead management ₋ Collect market information and conduct marketing analysis to support business needs and development. ₋ Execute Atlas Copco – Compressor Technique website content strategy including SEO, monitoring of results, implementation of web campaigns (SEA/SEM) and email campaigns, and content for social media channels. 2. System management, training and support ₋ Administer the day-to-day operations of the CRM system, ensuring it is up-to-date, accurate, and effectively utilized by all relevant teams. ₋ Plan, organize, implement & follow up the process of data cleansing to ensure the correct data are led in the CRM system (such as account, contact, etc.) ₋ Act as contact window to the global CRM support team for system enhancement. ₋ Provide training and support to team members on CRM best practices and system usage 3. Cross-business line collaboration ₋ Support the business lines in reporting, sales statistics, price management and monitoring ₋ Provide support to sales teams upon request ₋ Work with the business lines team on the Net Promotor Score (NPS) program and follow up NPS customer survey ₋ Take full responsibility and ownership of own professional development and actively participate in development activities in line with the set development plan ₋ Execute other jobs related activities assigned by direct manager. 4. Reporting ₋ Generate dashboard reports for key performance metrics ₋ Conduct other ad-hoc reports 5. Other tasks by Direct manager
Job Requirements: Required experiences Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Proven experience in CRM management, preferably in a lead or supervisory role. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and generate actionable insights. Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, Cloud 4 Customer). Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong project management and organizational skills. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be in the top 1% retailers on Amazon US. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 400 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only Amazon‘s sporting goods market but also to enter new e-commerce markets from many regions like Canada, Europe, Japan. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently. Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing. POSITION OVERVIEW The Senior Business Intelligence Analyst will play a crucial role in driving data-driven decision-making across the organization. This individual will be responsible for conducting in-depth data analysis, developing sophisticated BI reports and dashboards, and providing strategic insights to support business objectives I. JOB DESCRIPTION Data Analysis and Insights: Conduct thorough analysis of data from various sources, including sales, marketing, and customer behavior, to identify trends, generate actionable insights, and support strategic initiative Reporting and Dashboards: Design, develop, and maintain comprehensive and visually appealing dashboards and reports that facilitate data-driven decision-making across departments Advanced Analytics: Utilize advanced analytical techniques, including statistical analysis and predictive modeling, to provide deeper insights into business performance Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with stakeholders from different departments (e.g., marketing, sales, technology) to understand their data needs and ensure alignment with overall business goals Data Quality and Governance: Ensure the accuracy, integrity, and consistency of data by implementing and maintaining data quality and governance standards Mentorship and Support: Provide guidance and support to junior analysts, fostering their development and enhancing the overall analytical capability of the team Tool and Technology Optimization: Stay up-to-date with the latest BI tools and technologies, and recommend and implement improvements to enhance analytical processes
Job Requirements: II. SKILL AND EXPERIENCE A bachelor‘s degree in Business, Economics, Computer Science, or a related field. Advanced degrees are a plus. A minimum of 3 years of experience in a business intelligence or data analytics role, preferably within the e-commerce sector Proficiency in BI tools (such as Power BI), along with strong SQL skills. Knowledge of programming languages like Python is the must. Familiarity with Airflow, Jenkins is a plus Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey data-driven insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US? FOR YOU TO JOIN Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances. Salary review: annually or on excellent performance. Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events. Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year. Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package. Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration. FOR YOU TO GROW Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge. Challenges : Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work. Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry. FOR YOU TO STAY People : Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication. Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best. Career path : Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: NGÂN HÀNG TMCP KỸ THƯƠNG VIỆT NAM (TECHCOMBANK)
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Job Purpose The Underwriting Senior Expert will play a key role in the setup phase of a new life insurance company, focusing on developing underwriting guidelines, integrating data-driven risk assessment models, and enhancing the underwriting experience for customers. This role will require close collaboration with reinsurance partners, the product development team, IT, distribution teams at Techcombank, and third-party medical service providers. The Underwriting Senior Expert will also drive the integration of underwriting processes with Techcombank’s data ecosystem to create a seamless, efficient, and innovative underwriting experience. Key Responsibilities Underwriting Strategy & Guideline Development - Develop and implement underwriting guidelines that align with business strategy, regulatory requirements, and market trends. - Work closely with reinsurance companies to refine underwriting principles and establish risk selection criteria. - Collaborate with product development teams to design innovative underwriting solutions for new life insurance products. Collaboration with Techcombank & Distribution Teams - Engage with Techcombank’s distribution teams to understand customer risk profiles, sales needs, and underwriting support requirements. - Analyze customer financial and health risk data from the bank to tailor underwriting criteria to different customer segments. - Ensure underwriting processes align with the needs of bancassurance and agency distribution models. IT & Data Integration for Underwriting Innovation - Define business requirements for IT teams to develop underwriting platforms, automation tools, and AI-driven risk assessment models. - Oversee the integration of customer data between Techcombank and the insurance company to enable pre-approved underwriting and seamless customer onboarding. - Implement automated underwriting (AUW) systems to enhance efficiency and reduce manual underwriting efforts. Collaboration with Third-Party Medical Service Providers - Work with panel doctors, clinics, and third-party medical service providers to establish efficient medical underwriting procedures. - Develop partnerships with external underwriting engines and digital health platforms to expand underwriting capabilities. - Ensure that medical examination processes are seamless, reducing friction for customers while maintaining high-quality risk assessment. Process Optimization & Customer Experience Enhancement - Develop SOPs and workflows for underwriting operations, ensuring best practices are in place from the company's inception. - Identify opportunities to streamline underwriting processes and improve turnaround times. - Ensure a balance between risk management and an enhanced customer experience by minimizing delays and unnecessary medical requirements. Performance Monitoring & Continuous Improvement - Define and track key underwriting performance indicators (KPIs), such as approval rates, processing times, and risk quality. - Implement underwriting audit programs to ensure compliance with company policies and regulatory requirements. - Continuously analyze underwriting outcomes and recommend improvements based on data insights.
Job Requirements: Education - Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Insurance, Actuarial Science, or a related field. - Advanced certifications such as Fellow, Life Management Institute (FLMI), Fellow, Academy of Life Underwriting (FALU), or Chartered Life Underwriter (CLU) are preferred. Experience - Minimum of 7-10 years of life insurance underwriting experience, with strong expertise in medical and financial underwriting. - Experience in setting up underwriting processes, defining guidelines, and implementing automated underwriting models. - Proven ability to work with reinsurance companies to develop underwriting policies and obtain facultative support. - Experience collaborating with IT teams to implement digital underwriting tools and AI-based risk assessment models. - Exposure to bancassurance and an understanding of financial risk profiles within banking ecosystems. Skills & Competencies - Underwriting Strategy & Risk Assessment – Strong ability to develop underwriting principles that balance risk and business growth. - Regulatory & Compliance Knowledge – Deep understanding of Vietnam’s insurance regulations and their application in underwriting. - IT & Data Integration – Experience in defining business requirements for IT teams to build underwriting platforms and automation solutions. - Third-Party Collaboration – Strong negotiation and relationship management skills to work with reinsurance firms, medical service providers, and underwriting technology partners. - Process Optimization & SOP Development – Ability to design workflows and SOPs for efficient underwriting operations. - Data-Driven Decision Making – Expertise in utilizing financial and medical data to drive underwriting enhancements. - Stakeholder Management – Strong communication and leadership skills to work effectively with distribution teams, product development, and IT teams. Personal Attributes - Analytical & Detail-Oriented – Ability to assess complex underwriting cases with accuracy and precision. - Innovative & Strategic Thinker – Ability to develop next-generation underwriting solutions that drive competitive advantage. - Customer-Centric Mindset – Ensures underwriting processes enhance the customer experience while maintaining risk control. - Proactive & Agile – Thrives in a fast-paced startup environment, leading initiatives with minimal supervision. - Leadership & Initiative – Capable of setting up underwriting operations and driving process improvements from day one.
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư , Bảo hiểm

Job Description: 1. Develop sales targets and develop plans to implement sales targets of Account including: promotion programs, visibility, new listing 2. Job Description: 1. POSM Management (Point of Sales Materials) Oversee the deployment of POSM across stores, ensuring proper usage and visibility. Company: Concung.com - Con Cung Joint Stock Company
Job Description: Key Responsibilities: Sales Performance Management : Monitor and drive sales performance across retail stores, ensuring all locations meet or exceed sales targets and KPIs. Implement strategies to boost sales and enhance store performance. Team Leadership and Development : Lead, train, and mentor store sales teams to achieve business goals. Provide ongoing training to enhance product knowledge, sales skills, and customer service standards. Planogram Management : Monitor and implement the planogram at stores to increase the customers’ experience and satisfaction. Sales Reporting and Analysis : Monitor sales performance, analyze sales data, and identify trends to develop action plans. Provide regular sales reports and insights to senior management for decision-making. Inventory and Stock Management : Work with the supply chain to ensure stores are stocked appropriately, maintaining optimal stock levels and product displays. Address inventory issues and ensure smooth stock replenishment. Promotions and Campaign Execution : Collaborate with the marketing team to implement promotional campaigns, seasonal sales, and in-store events to drive foot traffic and increase sales. Sales Strategy and Market Development : Continuously assess the market and competitor landscape to adapt sales strategies, expand market reach, and capitalize on emerging opportunities.
Job Requirements: Qualifications and Skills: Experience : Minimum 2 years of experience in retail sales management. Experience with fashion brands is highly preferred. Leadership Skills : Proven experience in managing and motivating sales teams, with the ability to lead by example and inspire a high level of performance. Analytical Skills : Strong ability to analyze sales data, track performance, and identify opportunities for improvement. Industry Knowledge : Solid understanding of the fashion retail market, trends, and consumer behavior. Data analysis : Proficient in using retail management software, and data analysis. Communication Skills : Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships with customers, staff, and management. Problem-Solving Ability : Ability to think critically and make decisions quickly in a fast-paced retail environment. Company: HEINEKEN Vietnam
Job Description: We are on the hunt for a brilliant Innovation Product Owner to join our team and help us drive forward with some out-of-the-box thinking and ideas. As the Innovation Product Owner, you will be responsible for leading the charge on innovative product development, leveraging emerging technologies and pushing the boundaries of what's possible. In fact, we’re looking for someone who can make an impact to the market of food & beverage itself, in (several) innovative projects that connect end consumers and b2b customers. Responsibilities: Shape the value: Identify needs & gaps from current market and its distribution, internal stakeholders, and referrable oceans… to create values for the organization through initiations of new digital products, platforms, and technologies. Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to ensure that innovative products and services align with the company's overall strategy and goals. Own the journeys : You create and define journeys for our end consumers, but also to connect them with the ecosystem of our organization. We don’t digitalize clumsy processes, but bring them to the next level (perhaps having less processes is actually better – it’s your call) Deliver stuff, digital stuff: Lead (and own the success of) the development of those innovative product ideas and concepts, leveraging emerging technologies and trends (either from the market or Heineken Global). Development teams can be in-house, our Innovation dev hub, or external partner and Global partner, or can buy / rent a technology entirely. It’s up to you! Understand the customers / users: Develop a deep understanding of customer needs and preferences and use this knowledge to drive the development of products that resonate with our target audience. Depending on projects, users can be a normal beer drinker, or an accountant doing manual work, or a retail owner who barely knows about tech & app. That’s the exciting part of the job. Be the connector: Work closely with cross-functional teams to plan and execute the development of innovative products and services, using Agile methodologies and tools. Champion the Innovation: Keep in touch with the world to identify trends, technology and opportunities in the market, and use this information to inform product development decisions. Live by data: Use data and analytics to track the performance of innovative products and services, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions. Some of your projects might generate invaluable data as well. Fun fact: you can work with a lot of 1st party data, and pionner the transformation game of extracting values from data.
Job Requirements: 7-10 years of experience as a Digital Product Owner or similar role, with a proven track record of delivering digital products, services or transformation. A business domain regarding FMCG, B2B business, supply chain, marketing & trade marketing … is a plus. Strong experience in software development life cycle, especially consumer-facing mobile application and promotion-related softwares. Know enough PowerBI, SQL, Python to explore data indepently. Can estimate how many mandays a feature can get to start arguing with the tech lead. Strong leadership skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate cross-functional teams to achieve shared goals. In fact, you need to shape your story and convince people to follow! Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with stakeholders across the organization. Excellent project management skill, capable of driving projects from initiation to closing - sprinkled some pilots here and pivots there. Good with numbers. Seriously, there’re lots of numbers to crunch and estimate and project. At least you can sell your projects confidently with a wildly-estimated business cases. Experience working in an Agile environment, with a relatively thorough understanding of Agile methodologies and tools. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to use data to drive decisions. A passion for emerging technologies and trends, with a strong understanding of the latest developments in the market. If you're a creative problem solver with a passion for innovation, we want to hear from you! As our Innovation Product Owner, you'll have the opportunity to work on some truly cutting-edge projects and help us to stay at the forefront of our industry. So, if you're ready to take your career to the next level and join a team that's always pushing the boundaries, apply today and let's get started!
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm
