Job Description: Job Purpose The Senior Expert, Claims, will play a critical role in setting up and managing the claims function for a newly established life insurance company. This role is responsible for developing claims processes, defining Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), collaborating with IT to implement claims management systems, working with reinsurers on claims policies, and establishing strong partnerships with third-party service providers such as medical panels and claims investigators. The Senior Expert, Claims, will also work closely with Techcombank to integrate data insights and ensure a seamless claims experience for customers. Key Responsibilities Claims Process Setup & SOP Development - Develop and implement Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for claims processing, ensuring efficiency and compliance. - Design end-to-end claims workflows, from claim submission to assessment, approval, and payment. - Ensure alignment of claims processes with regulatory requirements and industry best practices. Collaboration with IT & Digital Transformation - Define business requirements for IT teams to implement a digital claims management system. - Work with IT and digital teams to integrate claims automation tools and AI-driven claims assessment models. - Ensure seamless integration of claims processing with policy administration and customer service platforms. Claims Risk Management & Reinsurance Coordination - Collaborate with reinsurance companies to define claims handling guidelines and facultative claims assessment. - Establish governance frameworks for claims risk monitoring and fraud detection. - Work closely with actuarial and underwriting teams to ensure claims trends inform future risk assessment strategies. Stakeholder Engagement & Collaboration with Techcombank - Engage with Techcombank’s distribution and risk teams to develop claims service standards that meet customer expectations. - Work on data integration between Techcombank and the insurance company to ensure smooth claims verification and settlement. - Provide training and support to distribution teams on claims procedures and fraud detection measures. Collaboration with Third-Party Service Providers - Establish and manage relationships with third-party medical panels, hospitals, clinics, and claims investigation firms. - Negotiate and monitor service level agreements (SLAs) with external partners to ensure high-quality claims services. - Ensure that external medical evaluations and claims assessments support the company’s risk management objectives. Customer-Centric Claims Experience - Develop a customer-friendly claims process that balances risk management with a smooth and transparent experience. - Implement digital solutions to allow self-service claims submission, tracking, and updates for customers. - Continuously monitor claims turnaround times and propose improvements to enhance customer satisfaction. Performance Monitoring & Continuous Improvement - Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for claims processing efficiency, fraud detection, and settlement ratios. - Analyze claims data to identify trends, potential risks, and areas for process optimization. - Ensure that claims policies evolve based on claims experience and market trends.
Job Requirements: Qualifications and Experience Education - Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Insurance, Law, or a related field. Experience - Minimum of 7-10 years of experience in life insurance claims management, including experience in setting up claims processes and guidelines. - Experience working with reinsurance companies on claims policies and facultative claims support. - Proven track record in digital transformation of claims operations, including automation and system implementation. - Strong experience in managing third-party claims service providers, including medical panels and claims investigators. - Exposure to bancassurance operations and an understanding of financial data integration to support claims processing. Skills & Competencies - Claims Management & Risk Assessment – Expertise in designing claims policies and handling complex claims cases. - Regulatory & Compliance Knowledge – Strong understanding of Vietnam’s insurance claims regulations and legal frameworks. - IT & Data Integration – Experience in working with IT teams to implement claims automation and digital claims processing. - Reinsurance & Fraud Prevention – Ability to collaborate with reinsurers to ensure risk-appropriate claims handling and fraud mitigation. - Stakeholder & Third-Party Management – Strong skills in engaging with Techcombank, reinsurers, and medical service providers. - Customer-Centric Approach – Ability to balance efficient risk management with an excellent customer experience in claims processing. Personal Attributes - Detail-Oriented & Analytical – Strong ability to assess claims cases with precision and accuracy. - Proactive & Strategic Thinker – Capable of setting up claims processes from scratch while anticipating future challenges. - Customer-Focused – Ensures claims operations are transparent, efficient, and customer-friendly. - Leadership & Initiative – Capable of driving claims transformation and operational setup in a startup environment. - Collaborative & Solution-Oriented – Works effectively with internal teams, reinsurers, and third-party service providers.

Company: Công Ty CP Dược Phẩm Pharmacity
Job Description: Job Summary: The Sourcing Supervisor will be responsible for driving and overseeing all sourcing strategies to attract qualified candidates for various roles across Pharmacity. As a leader in the recruitment process, you will manage a team of sourcing specialists and work closely with hiring managers to ensure a continuous pipeline of talent for both corporate and retail positions. This position requires a strong understanding of recruitment best practices, sourcing tools, and the pharmaceutical industry. Key Responsibilities: Sourcing Strategy Development: Design, implement, and optimize sourcing strategies tailored to Pharmacity’s hiring needs. This includes leveraging job boards, social media platforms (LinkedIn, Indeed), Boolean search, and other sourcing tools. Talent Pipeline Development: Build and manage a proactive candidate pipeline for Pharmacist Collaboration with TA Team: Partner closely TA Team to understand current and future hiring needs, providing guidance on candidate qualifications, market trends, and sourcing techniques. Employer Branding & Market Research: Promote Pharmacity’s employer brand across multiple platforms. Conduct market research to identify industry trends, competitive talent pools, and emerging sourcing techniques to attract top talent. Data-Driven Insights & Reporting: Track, analyze, and report on sourcing performance metrics to evaluate effectiveness, optimize strategies, and ensure continual improvements.
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree 2+ years of experience in sourcing Proven expertise in sourcing strategies, including Boolean searches, LinkedIn, job boards, and social media tools. Strong knowledge of the pharmaceutical, healthcare, and retail industries. Exceptional communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills. Ability to manage multiple priorities and lead a team in a fast-paced environment. A data-driven mindset with the ability to analyze and leverage sourcing metrics to drive decisions. Passion for recruitment and staying up-to-date on trends in talent acquisition and sourcing. What We Offer: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunities for career advancement within a fast-growing organization. A dynamic and collaborative work environment where your contributions are valued. Access to continuous learning and development resources to grow your career in HR and recruitment.

Company: Công ty TNHH United International Pharma
Job Description: The position is responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies for assigned ETC pharmaceutical brands, ensuring alignment with UIP's overall business objectives. This role involves strategic brand management, market analysis, sales collaboration, promotional planning, and stakeholder engagement to drive product performance in the ethical pharmaceutical sector. Develop and implement brand strategies and marketing plans to achieve business objectives. Manage product lifecycle, including market positioning, demand forecasting, and portfolio optimization. Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Sales, Medical Affairs, Regulatory Affairs, and Supply Chain) to ensure seamless execution of marketing initiatives. Conduct in-depth market research to analyze industry trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to support strategic decision-making. Leverage data analytics and market intelligence to identify growth opportunities and optimize marketing plans. Partner with sales teams to provide product training, sales tools, and marketing support to drive performance in hospitals and clinics. Monitor and analyze product performance metrics, adjusting strategies as needed to enhance market penetration. Support pricing and tender strategies in collaboration with the commercial team. Develop promotional materials, digital campaigns, and educational content to enhance brand visibility among healthcare professionals (HCPs). Engage with key stakeholders, including KOLs, hospitals, and industry associations, to strengthen product positioning. Organize and participate in medical conferences, product launches, and scientific events. Ensure all marketing activities adhere to pharmaceutical regulations, industry guidelines, and company policies. Collaborate with regulatory teams to manage product registrations and promotional approvals.
Job Requirements: Professional Background University graduate, Pharmacist background. An MBA or further studies in Marketing/Business is a plus. Minimum 7-10 years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry, with a strong background in product management, marketing, and sales within the ETC segment. Experience in a multinational pharmaceutical company is an advantage. Competency Requirements Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail. Ability to work independently as an individual performer, managing multiple tasks effectively. Good interpersonal and communication skills for collaboration with cross-functional teams. Basic knowledge of market research and data interpretation. Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications. Fluent in spoken and written English.

Company: Stella Leather Goods (Ho Chi Minh)
Job Description: Quality Team Management Develop and implement quality control processes, procedures, and policies to ensure that products or services meet or exceed customer expectation. Monitor and analyze data related to quality control processes, identifying trends, and making recommendations for improvement. Communicate with other teams, departments, and stakeholders to ensure that quality control processes are aligned with business objectives. Perform audits of quality control processes, identifying areas for improvement and making recommendations for corrective action. Manage and maintain quality control documentation, ensuring that all necessary records and reports are accurate and up-to-date. Participate in cross-functional teams to develop and implement new products or services, ensuring that quality control processes are integrated into the development process. Work closely with cross function teams for problem preventing and solving. Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices related to quality control, sharing knowledge and insights with team members and stakeholders. Follow up all customer complaint, work with cross function teams for CAP. Define and manage the Quality Strategy for Leather Goods, contributing to and in line with the overall Supply Chain Strategy: execute QA strategy / procedures / standards, establish KPI for the quality team in line with the overall supply chain KPI. Responsible for review and share digital / physical product standards and key attributes to central quality team, hubs and distribution teams. Driving budget & monitoring spending to deliver results in line with planned objectives. Quality Team Training and Improvement Lead and manage a team of quality control personnel, providing guidance, coaching, and supports as needed. Train team members on quality control processes, procedures, and policies, ensuring that they have the knowledge and skills necessary to perform their jobs effectively. New staff on board training Quality Standard Setting Work with suppliers and vendors to ensure that raw material and components meet established quality standards. Review all new developed samples (styles), give necessary comments for any potential risk in production or construction issue. Join all the review meeting, work closely with Product Development / Technical Team for bulk production friendly. Check raw material and work with Raw Material and Production Management Team for bulk standard setting. Lead on site Pre-Production meeting with cross function teams, follow up the sample call out, share the good practice, discuss the check point and set up detailed quality standard. Review the Pilot run for all new styles, lead the pilot run meeting with cross function teams. Collaborate with technical, industrialization and production teams to set up quality standards on product and to manage quality elevation alongside with full process. In agreement with Technical department, revise and implement product standards on materials and finished products and define quality inspection guidelines. Raise and document all the quality risks related to new collection items, providing a complete risk assessment report. Responsible for co-validating the sealing sample for final product approval and for co-validating the pre-production samples replicating the sealed product across contractors and vendors. Set clear standard of each below standard based on each brand: ① Material Defect allowance ② Workmanship standard and allowance ③ Leather Goods Type workmanship allowance Laboratory Operation Provide and follow up the test plan for materials, components, and finished product; ensure that test fail are addressed and solved in a timely manner. Make sure laboratory test SOP, standard, verifying results and judgement are following standard. Make sure laboratory test lead time and can catch up product development and bulk production. Make sure laboratory environment, facility, equipment and tool are maintained / neat / function. Laboratory test report are input and generate from system. And make sure test report are submit on-time. IQC Make sure IQC team follow inspection procedure based on each type of material / WIP. Make sure IQC team inspection and judge result based on correct standard. Make sure IQC team use correct tool or equipment to get accurate inspection result. Make ensure lead time of IQC inspection. On-time inspection report submitting to relevant parties. Make sure IQC team conduct IQC quality meeting after inspection, to share result and material issues to relevant teams. Organize and share periodical vendor quality reports, returns performance, inspection reports & return analysis, to discuss and agree required improvements with industrialization / technical teams and vendors / contractors as needed. Production QC Make sure production QC understand quality standard of each product, each brand. No discrepancy of quality standard between Production QC, Development QC, IQC and Laboratory. So quality standard is transparent through all quality team. Make sure production QC conduct correct operation, procedure, and strategies which management decided Ensure efficient operation and inspection. Ensure inspection result and data is accurate. Implement digital tools to make inspection work efficient and accurate. Ensure no any complaint from customer about bulk Finished Good or Top Sample Quality. Development QC Make sure Development QC follow operation, procedure and strategies which management decided. Ensure efficient operation and inspection. Ensure data and documentation is accurate and correct. Ensure data, documents and standard will transfer from development QC at development stage, and transparent through quality team. Ensure Development QC check WIP and FG of samples on-time. Other : Other tasks or projects assigned by management.
Job Requirements: Have more than 2 years of exeperience in Quality Manager in Garment industry Skills: Team management, Project / Time management, Communication, Problem solving skills, Basic Office (Word, Excel, Power Points) and ERP software operating skill Good at English (4 skills) Knowledge in global quality and production standards. Excellent analytical skills, with the ability to analyze data and identify trends. Excellent organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities simultaneously. Knowledge of quality control processes, procedures, and policies. Knowledge of relevant industry standards and regulations. Business Trip for meeting, conference or training will be required.
Industry: Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Dệt may / Da giày / Thời trang , Quản lý chất lượng (QA/QC)

Job Description: PURPOSE OF THE JOB To oversee and drive the performance of stores within the assigned region by achieving sales growth, ensuring operational excellence, developing high-performing teams, and delivering exceptional customer experiences. This role ensures alignment with the company’s strategic goals and retail standards while maintaining profitability and customer satisfaction GENERAL DUTIES and RESPONSIBILITIES 1/ Sales & Performance Management - Achieve and exceed the region’s sales targets, profitability goals, and other KPIs (e.g., UPT, VPT, and conversion rates). - Regularly analyze sales reports and performance data, identifying areas of improvement and developing actionable plans - Monitor footfall and customer behavior to optimize in-store strategies and promotions - Collaborate with the e-commerce team to support omnichannel initiatives like click-and-collect or in-store pickups 2/ Operational Excellence - Ensure adherence to global retail operational standards, including inventory management, visual merchandising, and customer service protocols - Conduct weekly store audits to ensure compliance with store standards, promotional execution, and corporate policies - Partner with cross-functional teams (e.g., Marketing, Merchandising, and Supply Chain) to implement tailored promotional campaigns - Drive sustainability initiatives, such as energy efficiency and waste reduction, in line with company objectives 3/ Team Leadership and Development - Recruit, train, and develop store managers and sales advisors to create high-performing teams - Provide coaching and feedback to store managers, focusing on leadership skills and operational excellence - Conduct regular performance reviews and appraisals, ensuring alignment with company goals - Foster a collaborative and positive working environment, promoting teamwork, creativity, and respect 4/ Customer-Centric Focus: - Monitor customer feedback through reviews, surveys, and mystery shopper reports to continuously improve customer experiences - Address escalated customer complaints and ensure timely resolution. - Implement initiatives to increase customer retention and loyalty in collaboration with the marketing team 5/ Retail Expansion and Strategy - Identify potential locations for new stores and provide recommendations for store openings or closures - Assist in planning and executing store openings, refurbishments, and relocations - Develop and implement tailored strategies to outpace competitors and increase market share. KEY INTERFACES [For Internal interface list Department, Position and specify Activity in Area of Interface Internal key customers Finance Department , Product Management Departments, Advertising & Promotion Department, HR, Demand Planning, Expansion, Procurement, Logistic, Brand Advisor, Sales Teams External key customers Landlord, Properties Management, Local Authority... Key performance indicators (KPI) Sales growth (monthly, quarterly, and yearly) compared to targets. Improvement in customer experience metrics (e.g., Net Promoter Score, mystery shopper results Operational compliance rates (e.g., inventory turnover, VM standards, and store audits). Staff performance metrics (e.g., training completion, attrition rates, and productivity). Execution and ROI of promotional campaigns and omnichannel initiatives.

Company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN HASAKI BEAUTY & CLINIC
Job Description: Category: Beauty. Report to: Beauty General Manager. Location: 555 3/2 Street, Ward 8, District 10, Ho Chi Minh City. Working time: 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM (Monday – Friday) and 8:30 - 12:30 (Saturday Morning). I. Career Objective: The Demand Planning Manager is responsible for forecasting demand, managing inventory, overseeing import and export processes, and closely collaborating with Sales & Marketing to optimize stock levels and ensure product availability to drive sales. This role plays a crucial part in balancing supply and demand, optimizing the supply chain to ensure an effective merchandise strategy, minimizing waste, and maximizing profitability for the company. II. Responsibilities: 1. Demand Forecasting & Supply Planning: Collect and analyze sales data, market trends, and marketing programs to accurately forecast demand for each product line. Develop a demand planning model to optimize inventory levels and prevent stock shortages or overages. Adjust supply plans based on sales performance, seasonal trends, marketing campaigns, and feedback from the Sales Team. Collaborate with different departments to ensure forecasts align with actual market conditions, optimizing costs and operational efficiency. 2. Inventory Management & Product Flow Optimization: Monitor and analyze inventory levels by SKU, expiration dates, and product lifecycle to develop appropriate replenishment plans. Work closely with Sales & Marketing to optimize stock levels, ensuring sufficient supply for major campaigns without excessive inventory. Develop clearance stock strategies, manage near-expiry products, and minimize the risk of unsold inventory. Coordinate with Finance to control warehousing costs, stock turnover rates, and merchandise budget management. 3. Import-Export & Supply Chain Management: Supervise import-export processes, liaising with suppliers, customs, and logistics providers to ensure timely shipments and compliance with legal regulations. Handle certification procedures, tariff duties, and import licenses for international products. Monitor transportation status and proactively address potential logistics and supply chain risks. Work with suppliers to streamline the import process, reducing lead times. 4. Collaboration with Sales & Marketing to Optimize Inventory & Boost Sales: Work closely with Sales & Marketing to accurately forecast product demand for promotional programs and new product launches. Propose discount campaigns, bundle promotions, and clearance sales to optimize inventory levels and drive sales. Assist in developing regional distribution plans, ensuring product availability at key sales locations. Coordinate with the marketing team to ensure adequate product supply for digital marketing campaigns, retail activations, and events.
Job Requirements: 1. Experience: Minimum 5-7 years of experience in Demand Planning, Supply Chain, Inventory Management, or Logistics, preferably in FMCG, cosmetics, or retail industries. 2. Education: Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain, Economics, Business Administration, or related fields. 3. Technical Skills: Strong knowledge of demand forecasting, inventory management, and supply chain operations. Experience working with ERP systems (SAP, Oracle, Microsoft Dynamics) and forecasting tools (Excel, Power BI, Tableau; Python is a plus). Understanding of import-export processes, customs regulations, and international logistics. Ability to analyze data, optimize inventory levels, and improve stock turnover rates. Experience collaborating with Sales & Marketing teams to plan inventory for sales campaigns. 4. Soft Skills: Strong data analysis and decision-making skills based on insights. Excellent communication and cross-functional collaboration to achieve business goals. Project management and problem-solving skills to handle challenges effectively.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ

Company: EDUPIA
Job Description: 1. Thông tin sản phẩm: Edupia Tutor là Chương trình Gia Sư Tiếng Anh chất lượng cao cùng Giáo viên có thành tích giảng dạy xuất sắc được chọn lọc kĩ lưỡng từ các trường sư phạm, ngoại ngữ hàng đầu trên toàn quốc, và đặc biệt nhiều kinh nghiệm chinh chiến các bài thi của Học Sinh Giỏi, chuyển cấp THCS, THPT. Là chương trình Tiếng Anh online với thành tích xuất sắc, chất lượng là ưu tiên hàng đầu trong lớp học gia sư EDUPIA, chương trình thiết kế giúp con đạt chuẩn đầu ra theo hệ Cambridge quốc tế. 2. Mô tả công việc: - Liên hệ, tư vấn bán khoá học online cho phụ huynh, học sinh theo nguồn data có sẵn, tỉ lệ chốt cao (30%) - Chịu trách nhiệm và đảm bảo doanh số được giao.
Job Requirements: - Nữ, có từ 3 tháng kinh nghiệm Telesale/sale các ngành nghề - Độ tuổi : 1992-2003 - Tinh thần thái độ tốt, xông pha, chăm chỉ - Tư duy nhanh nhẹn - Đam mê kiếm tiền, mục tiêu phát triển sự nghiệp trong nghề Telesale QUYỀN LỢI ĐẶC BIỆT CỦA TELESALE TẠI EDUPIA TUTOR: 1. Thu nhập cao, rõ ràng nhất trong các Công ty cùng ngành: - Thu nhập hàng tháng từ 13 - 30 triệu+++/tháng, bao gốm: + Lương cứng 9-13 triệu. + Hoa hồng: 2 - 9%. Thử việc hưởng 100% lương và hoa hồng. - Thưởng liên tục: thưởng nóng, thưởng best Seller, thưởng tăng tốc theo tuần, tháng, năm. - Đánh giá điều chỉnh tăng lương 2 tháng/ lần, 6 lần/ năm. - Ứng viên tại Edupia Tutor sẽ được: Cung cấp 100% data, không cần tìm kiếm khách hàng. Được trang bị máy tính, tai nghe, làm việc trên hệ thống CRM tiện dụng để liên hệ với khách hàng. 2. Thăng tiến: - Có cơ hội được thăng tiến lên Topsale, Trưởng nhóm (quản lý 10 Telesale) chỉ sau 3 tháng làm việc; Cơ hội thăng tiến lên Trưởng/ Phó Phòng Telesale (quản lý 20-30 Telesale) chỉ sau 6 tháng làm việc. - Được bán các sản phẩm tiếng Anh online chất lượng cao dẫn đầu thị trường Việt Nam. - Topsale được ưu tiên về data bán mới khi thiếu doanh số. - Được chủ trì các cuộc họp chuyên môn nhằm nâng cao kĩ năng cho Telesale cấp phòng. 3. Quyền lợi khác: - Được tặng bộ sản phẩm học Tiếng Anh online trọn đời ngay khi nhận việc tại Edupia. - Thưởng tháng 13, thưởng Lễ/ Tết - BHXH đầy đủ theo luật lao động, nghỉ phép 12 ngày/năm và các ngày lễ - Văn phòng đẹp, tiện nghi, hiện đại - Du lịch hàng năm với địa điểm hấp dẫn, thường xuyên tổ chức các hoạt động team building gắn kết cộng đồng, các hoạt động vui chơi giải trí cho nhân viên. - Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động với chính sách đãi ngộ tốt, có nhiều cơ hội nâng cao năng lực bản thân và tăng thêm thu nhập.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tư vấn , Dịch vụ khách hàng

Company: XP Power  Vietnam
Job Description: As an EHS Officer, your primary responsibility will be to ensure the organization's compliance with environmental, health, and safety regulations and standards embed safety into XP’s culture / behaviors. You will work closely with employees, management, Global EHS and regulatory bodies to develop, implement, and monitor effective EHS policies and procedures. Responsibilities: 1. EHS Compliance, Policy and Procedure Development: Stay up-to-date with local, state, and federal regulations related to environmental, health, and safety. Ensure the organization's compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards. Conduct regular inspections and audits to identify and address potential EHS risks and non-compliance issues. Establish, implement, and maintain EHS policies, procedures, and guidelines. Communicate with cross functions & employees on EHS policies, procedures, and regulations. Review and update policies and procedures to reflect changes in regulations or organizational needs. 2. Risk Assessment and Hazard Identification : Conduct annual risk assessments and hazard identification or in case of change for all the processes across the organization & develop strategies to mitigate and control risks. Collaborate with relevant departments to implement effective controls and preventive measures​​​​​​ 3. Emergency Preparedness: Develop and implement emergency response plans and procedures. Conduct emergency drills and exercises to test emergency response capabilities. Coordinate with relevant stakeholders to ensure readiness for potential emergencies 4. Incident Management: Investigate incidents, accidents, and near misses to determine root causes and develop corrective actions. Maintain incident reporting systems and documentation. Track and analyze incident data to identify trends and implement preventive measures. 5. Training and Education: Establish EHS training plan & conduct annual & refreshing training as planned for employees and contractors. Provide ongoing EHS training and education to enhance awareness and knowledge. Oversee & improving process of chemical safety management activities such as PPE matrix management, training, monitoring & SDS availability. 6. EHS Performance Monitoring and Reporting: Establish, consolidate and coordinate with relevant departments to lead the 5S improvement program of the factory according to the guidelines from Global. Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to monitor EHS/ESG/Net Zero performance. Collect and analyze data to evaluate EHS performance and identify areas for improvement. Provide First Aid Response for medical emergencies including injuries, chemical exposures, and fainting incidents Prepare and submit relating reports to management and regulatory bodies as required. 7. Waste Management Optimize waste management process ( industrial waste, domestic waste, hazardous waste & waste water,…) to identify cost-saving opportunities Conduct training sessions to employees on the best practices for waste reduction and recycling. Develop and implement waste minimization strategies 8. Continuous Improvement: Continuously assess and improve EHS management systems and processes. Implement best practices and industry standards to enhance EHS performance. Stay informed about new developments and advancements in EHS practices. Cordination with customer audit & ISO 14001, 9001, 13485 audit from 3rd party. Establish & implement corrective action plan for all the EHS findings from the audits May perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned
Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Occupational Health and Safety, Environmental Science, or a related field. Good at English communication. Must be able to work within a team structure and work collaboratively to implement safety programs. Proactive & Good at problem solving skills At least 5-6 years of experiences as EHS Engineer/Officer/ Supervisor in a manufacturing company ( Electronic is preferred). Experiences, skills and knowledge in machine safety, electrical safety, LOTO, chemical safety, lifting safety, contractor management In-depth knowledge of environmental, health, and safety regulations and standards. Familiarity with industry-specific EHS requirements and best practices. Strong understanding of risk assessment methodologies and hazard identification techniques. Excellent knowledge of incident investigation and root cause analysis. Experience in developing and delivering EHS training programs. Proficient in analyzing data and preparing reports. Professional certifications in EHS (e.g., NEBOSH, OSHA) are desirable.
Industry: Môi trường

Company: Soctrip
Job Description: About Us : Soctrip.com is a vibrant and rapidly growing ecosystem platform, dedicated to connecting people worldwide and fostering a community of exploration and discovery. Our platform serves as a community for users to share experiences, discover new destinations, and connect with like-minded individuals. Why join Us: We offer an experience that transcends traditional social networking platforms. At its core, our platform integrates a comprehensive array of services including Online Travel Agency (OTA), Food service, and E-commerce, providing users with a seamless and enriching ecosystem for both social interaction and practical needs. We facilitates effortless travel planning, allowing users to book flights, accommodations, and activities with ease, all within the same platform where they connect with friends and family. The Food service brings together culinary enthusiasts and food lovers, enabling them to discover new recipes, share cooking tips, and even order food delivery directly through the platform. Meanwhile, the Shopping feature empowers users to explore a vast marketplace, discover unique products, and make purchases in our ecosystem. What will you do Create and execute robust growth marketing strategies aimed at boosting user acquisition , engagement, and retention. Leverage data-driven insights to pinpoint optimization opportunities and enhance performance across all marketing channels. Oversee and refine digital advertising campaigns on multiple platforms. Implement A/B testing and experimentation to improve conversion rates, user experience, and overall campaign effectiveness. Work collaboratively with product, design, and engineering teams to introduce innovative marketing initiatives. Analyze key performance metrics and provide regular updates on campaign outcomes, highlighting trends and insights to guide future strategies. Stay current with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in growth marketing to foster innovation and maintain a competitive edge. Manage marketing budgets effectively to ensure optimal resource allocation and maximize return on investment. Keep abreast of advancements in digital marketing tools and platforms, recommending adoption as needed.
Job Requirements: What you will need Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field; advanced degree preferred. Proven track record of success in driving user acquisition and revenue growth through digital marketing channels. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, analyze trends, and identify insights to inform decision-making. At least 10 years' experience of managing and optimizing digital advertising campaigns in E-commerce, social networking or OTA industry. Adept at A/B testing and experimentation methodologies to optimize campaign performance. Excellent communication skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams. Creative thinker with a passion for innovation and problem-solving. Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving measurable business outcomes. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tiếp thị trực tuyến

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH MATHPRESSO VIỆT NAM
Job Description: The Senior Digital Marketing Executive at QANDA Study plays a key role in building and implementing digital marketing strategies to promote the company's products and services, aiming to increase growth and brand awareness. The job includes: Planning and Campaign Implementation: Develop overall and detailed digital marketing plans for each stage, product, or specific campaign. Implement, manage, and optimize multi-channel advertising campaigns on platforms: Facebook, Google Ads (Search, Display, YouTube), Zalo Ads, Coc Coc, TikTok, and other channels suitable for the target audience. Ensure campaigns are executed on schedule, achieve high efficiency, and adhere to the approved budget. Work closely with the Content Marketing team, Designers, and related departments to create advertising campaigns with engaging content, suitable for the target audience and consistent with the brand message. Analysis, Reporting, and Optimization: Monitor, measure, and analyze the effectiveness of marketing campaigns using data analysis tools (Google Analytics, Facebook Analytics, etc.). Evaluate campaign performance based on established KPIs (CPA, ROI, ROAS, Conversion Rate, Reach, Engagement, etc.). Prepare periodic reports and propose optimization solutions based on analysis results to improve campaign performance and optimize costs. Control and optimize advertising costs within the allocated budget, ensuring maximum efficiency. Supporting Other Marketing Activities: Support the organization of events, seminars, PR activities, and other offline marketing activities (if any). Work with partners, agencies, and marketing service providers (if any). Contribute ideas and propose new marketing strategies based on market trends and customer needs.
Job Requirements: Minimum 3 years of experience working as a Digital Marketing professional, preferably with experience in the online education field. In-depth knowledge of Digital Marketing channels and online advertising tools (Facebook Ads, YouTube Ads, Google Ads, Zalo Ads, TikTok Ads, etc.). Experience in implementing and optimizing multi-channel advertising campaigns, achieving set KPIs. Good data analysis skills, proficient in using analysis tools (Google Analytics, Facebook Analytics, etc.). Project management, teamwork, and effective independent working skills. Proactive, highly responsible in work, ensuring a thorough understanding of product/program information and completing tasks on time. Eager to learn, proactive in seeking new knowledge, willing to receive feedback, and adaptable to a dynamic and ever-changing startup environment.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH MỘT THÀNH VIÊN ĐẦU TƯ VÀ PHÁT TRIỂN  GIÁO DỤC NHÂN VĂN
Job Description: Job Purpose : Responsible for developing and implementing B2C, B2B(*) sales strategies to attract and maintain relationships with high-income clients and partners, driving revenue growth for the school. Key Responsibilities : Develop and execute B2B sales strategy : Create long-term and short-term sales strategies to target and convert businesses, organizations, and high-income families for student enrollment at the school. Analyze the market and competitors to propose effective sales solutions. Manage and maintain client relationships : Build and maintain long-term relationships with business partners and target clients. Update customer information and needs to propose suitable educational solutions. Work closely with the Marketing Manager : Collaborate with the Marketing Manager to optimize marketing campaigns that support sales efforts. Provide market insights, customer feedback, and campaign results to adjust the sales strategy. Meet and exceed revenue targets : Set sales targets for the team and oversee their execution. Ensure revenue goals are met through effective sales strategies and exploiting new business opportunities. Report and analyze sales performance : Regularly report on sales results, business opportunities, and client status to the Marketing Manager. Analyze sales data to adjust strategies and improve results. Organize and participate in events and seminars : Organize and attend events related to student enrollment, school introductions, and educational programs. Build partnerships with organizations and businesses with potential for collaboration.
Job Requirements: At least 3-5 years of experience in sales, especially B2B experience Preferably in the education industry. Strong skills in building and maintaining client relationships, especially with high-income clients. Good leadership and team management skills, with the ability to drive the team to achieve and exceed targets. Ability to work closely with other departments (Marketing, Finance, etc.) to achieve common goals. Excellent communication and negotiation skills with the ability to engage with large partners. Proficient in MS Office, CRM tools, and sales data analysis. Bachelor’s degree or higher, preferably in Business Administration, Marketing, Education, or related fields.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Giáo dục / Đào tạo , Bảo hiểm

Company: BSS Group
Job Description: BSS Group is a trusted leader in full-service eCommerce solutions. Since 2012, we have specialized in delivering cutting-edge solutions for Magento and Shopify merchants, operating across eight brands and serving customers in 150+ countries. We are looking for a Marketing Leader to play a key role in managing marketing projects of our new business unit, driving our ecosystem brand expansion and maximizing global impact. This position requires a strategic thinker with deep expertise in marketing disciplines and the ability to lead in-house and/or clients’ teams effectively. Key Responsibilities 1. Project-based Team Management: Lead and manage the marketing projects to serve in-house/clients’ objectives. Build, develop, and oversee the performance of team members. Ensure team members are aligned on goals, priorities, and execution plans. 2. Marketing Strategy & Performance Analytics: Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitive landscape to guide strategic decision-making. Develop comprehensive marketing plans and KPIs that integrate various channels and strategies. Continuously utilize project performance based on data analytics. 3. Collaboration & Report: Work cross-functionally with other teams (e.g., sales, product, operations) to align marketing strategies with broader goals. Represent the marketing team in meetings with managers and C-level executives for performance reports and strategic recommendations.
Job Requirements: At least 2 years of experience in leading a marketing team or managing marketing projects with proven results, preferably in SaaS, eCommerce, or marketing agency environments. Expertise in at least one core marketing discipline (content, SEO, PPC, etc.). Good planning and organizational skills, with demonstrated expertise in developing and executing detailed marketing strategies. Ability to prioritize tasks, manage timelines, and drive performance in a fast-paced environment. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English. IELTS 7.0 or above. Proficient in managing, collecting, and analyzing data to drive actionable insights and optimize marketing performance.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing

Performance Monitoring and Continuous Improvement - Monitor product performance metrics, analyzing data to assess profitability, customer satisfaction, and market competitiveness. - Gather feedback from customers and sales teams to identify areas for product improvement and innovation.
Job Requirements: Qualifications and Experience Education - Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Insurance, Marketing, or a related field. Experience - 5-8 years of experience in life insurance product development, with a proven track record of successful product launches. - Demonstrated experience in project management and cross-functional team collaboration. Skills - Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a creative approach to product innovation. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, capable of influencing stakeholders at all levels. - Proficiency in market research methodologies and data analysis. - Familiarity with regulatory requirements and compliance processes in the life insurance industry. - Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, delivering results within set timelines. This role is pivotal in driving the company's product strategy, ensuring a competitive edge in the market through innovative and customer-centric life insurance solutions.
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư , Bảo hiểm

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH MSC VIỆT NAM
Job Description: Collaborate with the Trade Manager to develop trade plans and strategies, considering market movements such as rates, vessel capacity, and client requests. Analyze trade data and trends to identify opportunities for cargo lifting, ocean freight improvement, or new products on the trades. Maintain and update freight rates and tariffs based on spot/NACs rates and contractual/long-term agreements. Coordinate with sales and freighting teams to ensure accurate and competitive pricing for all DCAs/IFF. Monitor capacity and space management within allocations given by Geneva/Regional to ensure optimal utilization. Act as a primary point of contact for MSC GVA, MSC Regional, and other MSC Agents to resolve specific issues and problems. Communicate with local stakeholders on GVA/RO directions, strategies, and goals. Achieve budget volume, revenue, and goals for the respective trade. Update prospects on market activities and trade performance, following GVA guidelines on budget volume-driven policy. Monitor space allocation versus booking on each feeder/M/V and coordinate with the ispace team, Transshipment Department, and Capacity team. Monitor cargo selection and yield management to ensure a balance of high/low paying cargo for respective trades daily. Participate in weekly meetings with the Sales team and check daily booking performance to update on trade performance and relevant issues. Prepare, review, and ensure weekly, monthly, and quarterly reports are accurate and submitted in a timely manner to respective management. Work closely with various internal departments, such as operations, logistics, VAS, finance, and HR, to ensure effective coordination and alignment of trade activities. Participate in cross-functional projects and initiatives as required. Perform any duties as assigned by the Trade Manager or Commercial Director
Job Requirements: Key Experience & Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field. Proven experience in trade management, logistics, or a related field. Experience in the shipping or logistics industry. Knowledge of international trade regulations and compliance Key Competencies & Skills Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret trade data and trends. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and trade management software. Strong organizational and time management skills.
Industry: Xuất nhập khẩu , Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH MỘT THÀNH VIÊN ĐẦU TƯ VÀ PHÁT TRIỂN  GIÁO DỤC NHÂN VĂN
Job Description: Job Purpose : Responsible for developing and implementing B2C, B2B(*) sales strategies to attract and maintain relationships with high-income clients and partners, driving revenue growth for the school. Key Responsibilities : Develop and execute B2B sales strategy : Create long-term and short-term sales strategies to target and convert businesses, organizations, and high-income families for student enrollment at the school. Analyze the market and competitors to propose effective sales solutions. Manage and maintain client relationships : Build and maintain long-term relationships with business partners and target clients. Update customer information and needs to propose suitable educational solutions. Work closely with the Marketing Manager : Collaborate with the Marketing Manager to optimize marketing campaigns that support sales efforts. Provide market insights, customer feedback, and campaign results to adjust the sales strategy. Meet and exceed revenue targets : Set sales targets for the team and oversee their execution. Ensure revenue goals are met through effective sales strategies and exploiting new business opportunities. Report and analyze sales performance : Regularly report on sales results, business opportunities, and client status to the Marketing Manager. Analyze sales data to adjust strategies and improve results. Organize and participate in events and seminars : Organize and attend events related to student enrollment, school introductions, and educational programs. Build partnerships with organizations and businesses with potential for collaboration.
Job Requirements: At least 3-5 years of experience in sales, especially B2B experience Preferably in the education industry. Strong skills in building and maintaining client relationships, especially with high-income clients. Good leadership and team management skills, with the ability to drive the team to achieve and exceed targets. (level Leader) Ability to work closely with other departments (Marketing, Finance, etc.) to achieve common goals. Excellent communication and negotiation skills with the ability to engage with large partners. Proficient in MS Office, CRM tools, and sales data analysis. Bachelor’s degree or higher, preferably in Business Administration, Marketing, Education, or related fields.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tư vấn , Giáo dục / Đào tạo

Company: CÔNG TY TÀI CHÍNH TNHH NGÂN HÀNG TMCP SÀI GÒN - HÀ NỘI  (SHBFinance)
Job Description: Support Testing of the Web / Desktop Applications which developed by SHBFC IT Development team and be responsible for all aspects of testing and Quality Assurance through the full project lifecycle (from Blueprinting through Implementation) Review, analyze the software requirements then develop the manual test cases before starting to develop the automation scripts Develop automation framework components in order to reduce test cycles and overall time to market Contribute to developing and maintaining a repository of regression automation test cases Own automation test script development and execution, data sourcing or data provisioning, defect analysis, and ensure that proper test result documentation and processes are followed as per the test strategy Assist with integrating test automations with the continuous integration build environment Oversee the creation & execution of test cases and test scripts Develop Performance Test for Multi-Clients & Servers to ensure the system stable & smooth Research new technology in Automation Testing and apply to projects Develop Automated In-House Tools to reduce working time for Business Projects Perform reports to QC leader the progress and status of the assigned tasks *** LÝ DO ĐỒNG HÀNH CÙNG SHBFINANCE: Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, cởi mở Thời gian làm việc từ thứ 2 – thứ 6, nghỉ trưa 1h30’ (40h/tuần) Chế độ làm việc Hybrid working từ 1 - 2 ngày làm việc từ xa/ tuần. Đồng nghiệp thân thiện, cởi mở với tư duy đề cao sự phát triển của mỗi cá nhân; Văn phòng làm việc với không gian mở, rộng rãi, được cung cấp đầy đủ các trang thiết bị để phục vụ cho công việc. Quan tâm đặc biệt đến nhân viên: Gói đãi ngộ cạnh tranh cùng chính sách nâng lương theo định kỳ. Tổng thu nhập TB 14 tháng lương/năm; Hỗ trợ ăn trưa lên tới 1.200.000 VND/tháng; Hỗ trợ gửi xe 200.000 VND/ tháng Nghỉ hưởng lương ngày sinh nhật + quà sinh nhật Quyền lợi chăm sóc sức khỏe đặc quyền bảo hiểm sức khỏe toàn diện SHBFC Care; Khám sức khỏe thường niên tại bệnh viện hàng đầu Việt Nam; Du lịch thường niên, hoạt động team building năm. Tập trung hỗ trợ sự phát triển cá nhân: Được tư vấn, đồng hành và hỗ trợ phát triển sự nghiệp cùng các cấp quản lý tài năng, giàu kinh nghiệm; Cơ hội tham gia các dự án lớn, đối tác quốc tế, đi đầu trong lĩnh vực tài chính tiêu dùng; Chính sách hỗ trợ các hoạt động học tập, nâng cao trình độ ngoại ngữ, trao đổi, chia sẻ kiến thức, giao lưu văn hoá (Training, Seminar...)
Job Requirements: B.S Degree in Information Technology / Computer Science or equivalent Minimum of 02 years experienced in automation testing Skilled in developing test automation scripting in Java Experience in one or more automated testing tools/frameworks (Selenium, Appium, RestAssured) Good understanding of performance and load testing (JMeter) Experience with Hybrid Framework, KeywordDriven Framework, DataDriven Framework Experience in continuous testing pipelines using Jenkins Good English communication skill (both verbal & non-verbal) Ability to review / analyze software requirements & Hands-on experience in developing manual test cases & automation Be able to develop test automation frameworks Intermediate knowledge of programming languages such as JavaScript, Java, C#, …etc or any other programing languages. Solid understanding of SQL, databases, and various data management tools. Knowledge of service integration technology and communication protocols. For example, Restful API, Webservice, Message broker such as RabbitMQ, Kafka, …etc. Experience in version control system such as GIT, SVN Understanding and following software development process and methodology like Waterfall, Kanban, Agile Scrum. Flexibility to adapt to changing instructions and requirements with high sense of commitment Ability to work independently as well as be proactive result-oriented team player Willingness to troubleshoot and solve complex problems Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with other developers, and relevant partners Integrity, Teamwork, Autonomous and Customer-Oriented Priority will be given to candidates with experience in robotic process automation (RPA)
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Company: Savills Vietnam
Job Description: C&B Operation: Accountable for developing, implementing and revising the overall C&B structure and policies in line with company objectives, HR policies and labor law to deliver C&B operations. Monitor payroll process including checking timesheet, payrolls (estimation and actual), cost comparison and reports Monitor PIT process and reports. Monitor compulsory insurance data and reports. Monitor bonus calculation and reports. Conduct salary and benefits survey (Mercer methodology) Support in salary review process Design and develop different schemes for variable remuneration packages, including pay structure, bonus, benefits. Prepare annual staff cost budget, including monthly, quarterly review and reporting. Remain up-to-date with laws and regulations in relation to payroll, tax and other legislative requirements, support peers on the implementation of company policies, programs, and initiatives. Manage the master data of employees, including data entry, updates, and storage of personal records for all employees. Monitor labor contract renewals process and record. Employee relation: Handle labor issues, disciplinary procedures (if any). Communicate policies pertaining to contracts, bonus, compensation, and benefits… Investigate and resolve employee complaints and grievances. Conduct exit interviews and provide feedback to management to analyze the turnover rate. Manage employee discipline and performance improvement processes. Performance Management: Manage the performance appraisal process, including communication, training.. Leadership task: Supervise and mentor a team of compensation and benefits professionals, providing coaching, training, and development opportunities. Collaborate with other HR functions, such as Talent Acquisition and Talent Management, Training to support organizational objectives related to talent acquisition and retention. Other tasks as assigned by HR Director.
Job Requirements: Specification: Bachelor's degree or higher in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. At least 3 years of C&B’s experience in the business size of over 300 headcounts, with at least 1 year in a supervisory role. Manage a team of 2-3 members. Competencies: Strong understanding of compensation principles, Labor law, PIT law, Social Insurance regulation. Familiarity with benefits administration, including health and wellness programs, retirement plans, and insurance policies. Good English communication skills, spoken and written. Hard skill: Must have: Proficient MS: word, excel, powerpoint. Power BI is a plus. Standard C&B Operations such as: Labor Law, Payroll, Insurance, Policies & Procedures, Budget & Planning, PIT,... Nice to have: Total Rewards (salary structure, cost analysis & job evaluation, performance appraisal, recognition, etc.) HR Information System Soft Skill Communication, Solution Focused, Data-driven, Analyzing, Leadership, Change Agile
Industry: Nhân sự

Manage Campaign Implement, Price Settle, Monitor Stock Control and Order Fullfillment. Data Analysis and report to E-Commerce Manager
Job Requirements: Qualifications: Can communicate in English or Chinese is a must. At least 1-2 years of experience in operating platforms such as Shopee,Lazada and Tiktok. Familiar with platform operations, capable of analyzing platform data, and planning promotions. Quick learner, Interested in marketing trends and is friendly to colleagues Please send CV/ Resume in English or Chinese version only Additional Perks: An opportunity to work and learn from top experts in the field who have earned their positions through skill, not luck. Company: Vantage Logistics Corporation

Job Description: Analyze internal processes and propose AI application solutions to automate tasks and enhance efficiency. Collaborate with departments to analyze internal workflows and identify AI automation opportunities. Develop and optimize AI prompts to help employees utilize AI effectively. Train and guide employees on applying AI in their daily tasks. Implement AI in functional operations and data analysis tasks. Ensure AI provides accurate information and minimizes errors. Stay updated with the latest AI technologies such as OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Midjourney, and Copilot AI. Experiment with and propose AI solutions to optimize productivity across departments. Support the testing and deployment of AI applications in logistics and transportation operations. Perform other tasks as assigned by direct management.
Job Requirements: Education: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Data Science, or a related field. Experience: At least 1 year of experience in utilizing and applying AI in practical work. Understanding of AI operations and real-world business applications. Knowledge & Skills: In-depth knowledge of ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, Gemini, Copilot AI, and other AI tools. Strong analytical thinking, experimentation, and AI prompt optimization skills. Preferred candidates with experience in AI implementation in logistics and transportation. Age: 22 - 35 years old. BENEFITS: Salary: Negotiable. Holiday and Tet bonuses, wedding/funeral allowances, 13th-month salary, and annual salary review. Opportunities for specialized training and professional development through company projects. Professional and friendly working environment. Social insurance as per regulations. Company trips, team-building activities, and year-end parties. Working hours: Monday to Saturday morning. (Morning: 08:00 - 12:00 | Afternoon: 13:00 - 17:30) Work location: Tower A (Officetel), Rivergate Residence, 151-155 Bến Vân Đồn, Ward 6, District 4, Ho Chi Minh City.

Company: Công Ty TNHH SML Việt Nam
Job Description: - Provide technical advice and support for various corporate IT systems, data management and order process to internal departments and external vendors - Acquire, analyze, design and implement EDI development and business or system workflow from clients and collaborate with regional IT and internal departments to achieve project objectives - Participate in testing and defect management to ensure the quality of any development - Efficiently track, monitor and report project implementation status by regular basis to ensure project deliverables on schedule - Provide documentation and training and ongoing support to users - Manage internal IT projects and coordinate with internal departments and external vendors with minimum supervision

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH DAESANG VIỆT NAM
Job Description: Our company is one of the fastest growing packaged food company in Vietnam. To maximize the growth and find the new opportunity, we are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Strategic Planning and Intelligence Specialist. This role will focus on finding a new business opportunity and long term growth strategies. The ideal candidate will possess strong analytical skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.This role offers a unique opportunity to shape the company's future through data-driven strategies 1. Market Analysis Conduct in-depth market research to understand consumer behavior, market demands, and potential risks Analyze the market trends, industry development to identify growth opportunities Establish the Market Database to strengthen Company's Market Intelligence Competence Analyze competitior's investments, assets and corporate activities and "connect the dots” with regard to their strategic intent, plot out potintial next moves. 2. Support Company's Strategic Planning Develop and execute long-term business strategies aligned with corporate mission, vision and goals. Participate in multiple business strategy projects that produce recommendations for addressing major strategic issues, identify major growth opportunities and develop business plans for realizing these opportunities. Create new business cases to be presented to senior management and Board. Monitor and coordinate the vast range of company data to find the possible M&A Candidates 3. Reporting and Presentation Develop, analyze and prepare comprehensive reports and presentations for senior management and Board (Vietnam / Korea) on regular or occasional basis. Provide regular updates on Market intelligence and Industrial updates [Advantages] Career Growth: Opportunities for professional development and international exposure. Supportive Environment: Work in a collaborative and dynamic team in both Vietnam and Korea Impactful Work: Play a key role in shaping the company’s growth in Vietnam
Job Requirements: [Key Qualifications] Experience: 3+ years of experience in FMCG field or Foreign Direct Investment Company. MBA is a plus Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Economics, Finance, Marketing or a related field. Technical Skills: Proficiency in MS Office(Powerpoint, Excel, Word). Familiarity with business intelligence tools is an advantage. Communication: Proficiency in English is mandatory, Korean language is an advantage [Competencies] Strategic thinking and analytical skills, with the ability to digest and synthesize large amount of data and information into executive-level reports and documents. Integrity and Reliability: Demonstrates responsibility and consistency in delivering work. Abililty to work effectively with internal Daesang teams and executives. Respect for Others: Values diversity and respects the perspectives and contributions of others. Learning Orientation: Actively seeks opportunities to learn and grow professionally. A “can-do” attituce and tolerance of ambiguity
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống

Job Title: Warehouse Process & System Supervisor (Cu Chi Province)
Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: The Warehouse Process & System Specialist will support the Warehouse Process and System Manager in ensuring operational efficiency, system integrity, and process improvements within the warehouse. This role involves assisting in workflow optimization, process documentation, training facilitation, system management, and inventory control. The specialist will collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive efficiency, reduce errors, and support automation efforts to enhance warehouse operations. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND AUTHORITIES 1. Process Optimization - Assist in analyzing warehouse workflows and identifying areas for improvement. - Support the development and implementation of Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs). - Participate in Lean and Six Sigma process improvement initiatives. 2. Training and Process Development: - Assist in developing and conducting training programs for warehouse staff. - Help document warehouse processes and implement error-proofing controls. - Conduct training audits to ensure effectiveness and adherence to established procedures. 3. System Management: - Support the administration of the Warehouse Management System (WMS) and related applications. - Assist in system configuration, updates, and troubleshooting. - Provide user training and technical support for warehouse staff. 4. Inventory Control: - Monitor inventory accuracy through cycle counts and reconciliation activities. 5. Safety and Compliance: - Ensure adherence to warehouse safety protocols and compliance requirements. - Assist in safety training and compliance audits. - Support initiatives to minimize accidents and improve workplace safety. 6. Data Analysis and Reporting: - Help track key performance indicators (KPIs) related to warehouse operations. - Assist in preparing reports on process efficiency, system performance, and operational issues. - Utilize data analytics to identify trends and suggest process enhancements. 7. Collaboration and Communication: - Work closely with warehouse staff, IT, logistics, and other departments to ensure smooth operations. - Facilitate communication between teams to resolve operational issues efficiently. - Participate in meetings and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.
Job Requirements: REQUIREMENTS Education Bachelor's Degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field. Experience Minimum of 2 years in warehouse operations, system management, or process improvement. Knowledge 1. Understanding of warehouse operations, inventory management, and logistics. 2. Familiarity with safety regulations and warehouse compliance standards. 3. Knowledge of Lean, Six Sigma, or other process improvement methodologies (preferred). 4. Awareness of warehouse automation tools and technologies. Functional Skills 1. Proficiency in Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) and ERP software. 2. Ability to analyze data using Excel, Power BI, or similar tools. 3. Problem-solving and troubleshooting skills to support system and process improvements. 4. Strong attention to detail and analytical mindset. 5. At least intermediate level of English proficiency - speaking & understanding. Other Abilities 1. Effective communication and collaboration abilities 2. Adaptability and a continuous improvement mindset. 3. Strong organizational and time management skills.
Industry: Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận , Điện / Điện tử / Điện lạnh / Điện công nghiệp

Company: IDOCEAN Co.,ltd
Job Description: The Trade Marketing Lead acts as the bridge between Sales & Marketing , responsible for optimizing trade campaigns to maximize revenue, enhance customer experience, and strengthen distributor relationships . This role requires a highly experienced trade marketer with a strategic mindset, adaptability, and a growth-oriented attitude to continuously improve business performance. Key Responsibilities: Trade Marketing Strategy & Planning Develop and implement trade marketing programs tailored to different sales channels ( GT , MT, HORECA, Ecommerce…). Work closely with Sales and Marketing teams to design merchandising, promotion, and POSM strategies for effective market penetration. Analyze consumer behavior and sales data to optimize in-store activation and demand-generation initiatives. Boosting Sales Performance & Customer Retention Design and execute loyalty programs to increase distributor engagement and retention . Develop and implement sell-out driven campaigns to ensure strong product distribution and sell-through. Assess campaign performance to optimize costs and maximize revenue . POSM & Budget Management Manage and optimize POSM production and promotion budgets to ensure the highest ROI. Oversee POSM allocation and implementation to maintain brand consistency at retail touchpoints. Market Analysis & Reporting Track and analyze sales performance, stock levels, and market share , proposing strategic adjustments. Conduct market research and competitor analysis to fine-tune trade marketing strategies. Prepare periodic reports on trade marketing effectiveness and ROI . Field Trade & Business Trips Conduct regular market visits and trade field activities to ensure effective execution of trade marketing strategies. Work closely with on-ground sales teams and key distributors to address market challenges and opportunities.
Job Requirements: Experience & Knowledge At least 5 years of experience in Trade Marketing, preferably in FMCG / F&B industries. Proven expertise in sell-out strategies, distributor loyalty programs, and in-store activations . Strong understanding of GT, MT, and HORECA distribution channels. Proficient in sales data analysis and consumer insights . Strategic mindset with strong market awareness and consumer behavior knowledge. Skills & Personal Traits Growth-oriented, proactive, and continuously improving processes for higher efficiency. Fluent in English communication is a plus (both written and spoken). Willing to travel frequently for business trips and field trade activities. Working time: Mon - Sat (8:00 - 17:00, 2 Sat off/month)
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: Chi nhánh Công ty TNHH Olam Việt Nam tại Tiến Nga
Job Description: Olam Food Ingredients (ofi) is a global leader offering naturally good food & beverage ingredients and solutions. ofi commenced operations in Vietnam in 1997, setting up its representative office. Since then, we have established an extensive presence across different parts of Vietnam, including our head office in Ho Chi Minh City and regional offices in Binh Dinh, Long An, Dong Nai, Phu Yen, Lamdong and Gialai Provinces. ofi Vietnam is currently the largest exporter of Cashews, Pepper & Instant Coffee in Vietnam, investing in the state-of-the-art instant coffee facility and running 7 large factories with 7,500 employees across Central & South Vietnam. Our operations have an interface with a farmer network of 2 million farmers. We are also amongst the largest exporter of Green Coffee in Vietnam. We have established sustainability programmers for black pepper, coffee & cashew. We are excited about our future prospects in Vietnam as the country has huge potential in agriculture. Objective/Purpose of Job: Execute the business plans for the quarter Develop long term strategy, to increase top line and reduce costs Budgetary Responsibility: Execute Minor projects [<$10k] and support large projects Duties & Responsibilities Role is for a dedicated and detail-oriented Associate to support our management team, in driving strategic initiatives and assisting in the execution of business plans. This will include coordinating with various teams such as Logistics, Planning, Warehouse, and Production to ensure effective operations. - Drive the business plans closely, on a quarter to quarter basis. - Analyze data to identify trends and inform decision-making processes - Identify new business opportunities, markets, and partnerships. - Prepare reporting snapshots and communication decks - Continuous Coordination with Imports, Warehousing, Planning, Upcountry Units, and Shipping teams to execute the operations plan - Monitor and control, business health, stock aging, asset utilizations - Develop Process manual by coordinating with Production/Factory manager - Lead process excellence in coordination with the Managers and support the implementation of best practices
Job Requirements: Education/Knowledge, Skills, Attributes, Experience & Other Requirements Bachelor’s/ master’s degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Sales, or related field. 4-7 years of experience in business development or related role Good understanding of import and export regulations and logistics operations. Strong organizational and project management skills and the ability to interpret data Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) Interest to develop a career in business operations Basic exposure to standardised Quality and GMP systems in Food Processing Our Purpose is to “be the change for good food and a healthy future”. At ofi , we celebrate our diversity. ofi provides equality of opportunity for all persons with respect to hiring without discrimination on the grounds of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, pregnancy, age, disability, veteran status, or sexual orientation. All employment decisions will be based on qualifications, merit, and business needs.
